name: Aether Walker

custom.name: Remove Teleport Cooldown
custom.format: Teleport no longer has a cooldown but costs 25 Arcane Power.

flavor: Virgil quickly lashed together remnants of his old broken wands and an unidentified artifact and sanctified them with his own blood, allowing him to teleport to safety and to begin formulating his revenge.

name: Ageless Might
flavor: Crafted during the time of the ancients and passed down from chieftain to chieftain since, this belt is a symbol of power among the barbarian tribes.

name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander

custom.name: Chance to Gain Random Shrine Effect
custom.format: Chance on killing a demon to gain a random Shrine effect.

flavor: "For love of the nephalem Philios, I will leave this weapon behind, and exchange the powers of Heaven for the peace of Sanctuary." �The angel Lycander

name: Akanesh, the Herald of Righteousness
flavor: Akanesh was the favored weapon of the Grand Maester of the templar order. Immaculate and gleaming, it is said to possess the sharpest blade ever forged. That may well be true�Akanesh has cut down innumerable evils... and perhaps a few innocents as well.

name: Akarat's Awakening

custom.name: Chance to Reduce Cooldowns on Block
custom.format: Every successful block has a %d%% chance to reduce all cooldowns by 1 second.

flavor: "And Yaerius appeared unto Akarat and showed him the Light that illuminates all souls with its blessed power. So long as we trust in this sacred force, we shall have strength everlasting and falter not in our trials." �Excerpt from a mystic�s account of the life of Akarat

name: Akkhan's Addendum

custom.name: Akarat's Champion Gains Extra Runes
custom.format: Akarat's Champion gains the effects of the Prophet and Embodiment of Power runes.

flavor: "The best armor in the world is of little use without a good weapon." -Akkhan

name: Akkhan's Leniency

custom.name: Blessed Shield Damage Bonus
custom.format: Each enemy hit by your Blessed Shield increases the damage of your Blessed Shield by %d%% for 3 seconds.

flavor: "Let no crusader succumb to their base emotions, for they are to be the mere vessels of Zakarum�s righteous punishment, and the purveyors of his mercy." -Akkhan

name: Akkhan's Manacles

custom.name: Blessed Shield Damage on First Target
custom.format: Blessed Shield damage is increased by %d%% for the first enemy it hits.

flavor: "Crusaders are unburdened by the tedium of a worldly life, but they must still be bound by charity, duty, and Akarat's will." -Akkhan

name: Ambo's Pride
flavor: There are longswords and there are greatswords. And then there is this sword.

name: Ancestors' Grace

custom.name: Revive
custom.format: When receiving fatal damage, you are instead restored to 100%% of maximum Life and resources. This item is destroyed in the process.

flavor: "This unique amulet was originally found on a dead necromancer before being brought to Khalim, the Que-Hegan. It was he who named it, after his archbishops and their philosophers finally divined its powers. I often wonder why Khalim did not use it himself when he was mortally wounded, before being dismembered by his corrupted High Council." �Abd al-Hazir

name: The Ancient Bonesaber of Zumakalis
flavor: A mythical weapon, forged in a remote region to slay a monster of unspeakable power. The scrimshaw markings "Em Ryog Elth'orp" are nearly worn away.

name: Ancient Parthan Defenders

custom.name: Damage Reduction on Stun
custom.format: Each stunned enemy within 25 yards reduces your damage taken by %d%%.

flavor: These bracers were first worn in the distant past by members of the Partha Guard. Though musty from age, they retain power that has protected the city for centuries.

name: Andariel's Visage

custom.name: Poison Nova Damage
custom.format: Chance on hit to release a Poison Nova that deals %d%% weapon damage as Poison to enemies within 10 yards.

flavor: Some long-forgotten artisan crafted this helmet in the hideous likeness of the Maiden of Anguish. For what purpose, none can say.

name: Andariel's Visage

custom.name: Poison Nova Damage
custom.format: Chance on hit to release a Poison Nova that deals %d%% weapon damage as Poison to enemies within 10 yards.

flavor: Some long-forgotten artisan crafted this helmet in the hideous likeness of the Maiden of Anguish. For what purpose, none can say.

name: Anessazi Edge

custom.name: Zombie Dogs Stun When Summoned
custom.format: Zombie Dogs stuns enemies around them for 1.5 seconds when summoned.

flavor: The secrets of this blade are known only to the artisans of the Silzer Plains.

name: Angel Hair Braid

custom.name: Punish Gains All Runes
custom.format: Punish gains the effect of every rune.

flavor: �Death is preferable to the fate suffered by those who are taken by the Burning Hells, for theirs is an existence of misery and pain. If they could only strike back against those who imprisoned them, they would die contented.� -The Journals of Deckard Cain

name: Angel Hair Braid
flavor: This belt is composed of sorcerous fibers that are light but unbreakable.

name: Aquila Cuirass
flavor: Ceremonial armor commemorating the chieftain Ghaold's victory over the wild men from the east.

name: Aquila Cuirass

custom.name: Damage Reduction Threshold
custom.format: While above %d%% primary resource, all damage taken is reduced by 50%%.

flavor: Ceremonial armor commemorating the chieftain Ghaold's victory over the wild men from the east.

name: Arcane Barb
flavor: The shimmering metal stock conceals a strange power source capable of charging each shot with arcane energy.

name: Archfiend Arrows
flavor: Very rare. Made from bones harvested from a live demon�not an easy thing to do.

name: Archmage's Vicalyke

custom.name: Mirror Images Multiply
custom.format: Your Mirror Images have a chance to multiply when killed by enemies.

flavor: "Ha! That was but the first of many times I supposedly met death at the hands of my enemies." �Archmage Horazon

name: Arcstone

custom.name: Pulse Damage
custom.format: Lightning pulses periodically between all wearers of this item, dealing %d%% weapon damage.

flavor: Robbers plundering an ancient tomb near Westmarch discovered forty-two skeletons laid out in repose, each wearing one of these rings. Their origins and creators have been lost to the ages, but the Arcstone rings have returned.

name: Armor of the Kind Regent

custom.name: Smite hits second target
custom.format: Smite will now also be cast at a second nearby enemy.

flavor: "Yoel, the so called 'Kind Regent' of Taubej, was anything but. He took great pleasure in torturing his enemies, real or imagined, and periodically would have a random peon dragged out into the square to be tortured to death, just to keep his people scared and docile. Yoel named himself the Kind Regent, as he truly believed he was a benevolent ruler. Of course, he was quite mad." �Deckard Cain

name: Arreat's Law

custom.name: Weapon Throw Extra Fury
custom.format: Weapon Throw generates up to %d additional Fury based on how far away the enemy hit is. Maximum benefit when the enemy hit is 20 or more yards away.

flavor: A relic from the time before the fall of Arreat.

name: Arreat's Law
flavor: A relic from the time before the fall of Arreat.

name: Arthef's Spark of Life

custom.name: Heal When Killing Undead
custom.format: Heal for %d%% of your missing Life when you kill an Undead enemy.

flavor: Arthef of the Dying Ones crafted this weapon to translate the misbegotten life of the undead into the living.

name: Ashnagarr's Blood Bracer

custom.name: Shield Increase
custom.format: Increases the potency of your shields by %d%%.

flavor: �Demon blood is a very important tool in the wizard�s arsenal. I infused this bracer with it, as a matter of fact. The extraction method was agonizing, to be sure, just thinking about it brings a smile to my face.� - Ashnagarr, First Wizard of the Accursed Multitude

name: Atrophy
flavor: Crafted by demonic hands.

name: Augustine's Panacea

custom.name: Elemental Arrow Bonuses
custom.format:
Elemental Arrow gains an effect based on the rune:
   Ball Lightning now travels at 30%% speed.
   Frost Arrow damage and Chilled duration increased by %{0}d%%.
   Immolation Arrow ground damage over time increased by %{0}d%%.
   Lightning Bolts damage and Stun duration increased by %{0}d%%.
   Nether Tentacles damage and healing amount increased by %{0}d%%.

flavor: The demon hunter Augustine liked to use the right projectile for every occasion. She was thrilled to discover this quiver in an ancient barrow.

name: Autumn's Call
flavor: Contemplate the falling leaves, colored by the rays of the waning sun. Strike forth from a place of peace.

name: Avarice Band

custom.name: Gold Increases Pickup Radius
custom.format: Each time you pick up gold, increase your Gold and Health Pickup radius by 1 yard for 10 seconds, stacking up to 30 times.

flavor: "A great demon lounged against stacks of treasure as his minions delivered more and more goods unto him. Gold, gems, and exquisite weapons fell at his feet, but still, he demanded more." � Excerpt from the scrolls of Malzakam

name: Azurewrath

custom.name: Aura Damage vs Undead
custom.format: Undead enemies within 25 yards take %d%% weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked back.

flavor: Before he fell, Izual was the bearer of the runeblade Azurewrath, an ancient sword blessed by the Song of the Arch as an instrument of the righteous.

name: Azurewrath

custom.name: Aura Damage vs Undead
custom.format: Undead and Demon enemies within 25 yards take %d%% weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked into the air.

flavor: Before he fell, Izual was the bearer of the runeblade Azurewrath, an ancient sword blessed by the Song of the Arch as an instrument of the righteous.

name: Bakkan Caster
flavor: Crafted by the reclusive dwellers of the deep woods to defend their sacred territory.

name: Bakuli Jungle Wraps

custom.name: Extra Firebats Damage
custom.format: Firebats deals %d%% increased damage to enemies affected by Locust Swarm or Piranhas.

flavor: "Unbearable creatures of the night plagued the Bakuli Jungle region. They were dangerous and not easily seen. It was a wonder that we all survived." -Account of Tapeks, Krum, Astraelly, Tanooki, Franklin, Kuan, and Tiget, the last known group of adventurers to pass through alive.

name: Bakuli Jungle Wraps

custom.name: Extra Firebats Damage
custom.format: Firebats deals %d%% increased damage to enemies affected by Locust Swarm or Piranhas.

flavor: "Unbearable creatures of the night plagued the Bakuli Jungle region. They were dangerous and not easily seen. It was a wonder that we all survived." -Account of Tapeks, Krum, Astraelly, Tanooki, Franklin, Kuan, and Tiget, the last known group of adventurers to pass through alive.

name: Balance
flavor: "We must walk the middle way between chaos and order, and not allow our emotions to sway us." �Tenets of the Veradani

name: Balance

custom.name: Tempest Rush Crit
custom.format: The damage of Tempest Rush is increased by 200%% and when your Tempest Rush hits 3 or fewer enemies, it gains 100%% Critical Hit Chance.

flavor: "We must walk the middle way between chaos and order, and not allow our emotions to sway us." �Tenets of the Veradani

name: Balance

custom.name: Tempest Rush Crit
custom.format: The damage of Tempest Rush is increased by %d%% and when your Tempest Rush hits 3 or fewer enemies, it gains 100%% Critical Hit Chance.

flavor: "We must walk the middle way between chaos and order, and not allow our emotions to sway us." �Tenets of the Veradani

name: Balefire Caster
flavor: "Use fire to fight fire, I always say." �Demon Hunter Raykal

name: Balefire Caster
flavor: "Use fire to fight fire, I always say." �Demon Hunter Raykal

name: Baleful Remnant

custom.name: Summon Phalanx Avatars
custom.format: Enemies killed while Akarat's Champion is active turn into Phalanx Avatars for 10 seconds.

flavor: "The head of this curious weapon consists of a highly unusual and volatile rock formation. Some speculate it came from a meteor�or an entirely different plane of existence, silly as that is. It has defied the understanding of scholars for centuries, but then again, I have never had a look at it!" �Abd al-Hazir

name: Band of Hollow Whispers

custom.name: Haunt Nearby Enemies
custom.format: This ring occasionally haunts nearby enemies.

flavor: The mutterings of souls trapped within the ring grow louder as their power is drained with each spell cast by the wearer.

name: Band of Might

custom.name: Damage Reduction on Movement Skills
custom.format: After casting Furious Charge, Ground Stomp, or Leap, take %d%% reduced damage for 8 seconds.

flavor: "Seems designed to reduce damage, but I�m not sure how it works. Obviously, it failed its previous owner. Hopefully it will work better for you."  �Haedrig

name: Band of Might

custom.name: Damage Reduction on Movement Skills
custom.format: After casting Furious Charge, Ground Stomp, or Leap, take %d%% reduced damage for 8 seconds.

flavor: "Seems designed to reduce damage, but I�m not sure how it works. Obviously, it failed its previous owner. Hopefully it will work better for you."  �Haedrig

name: Band of Rue Chambers

custom.name: Increase Spirit Generation
custom.format: Your Spirit Generators generate %d%% more Spirit.

flavor: "Rue chambers are rooms within templar strongholds where penitents are reeducated through the harshest of means. Here, they renounce their past sins and give their lives over to the cause of the Zakarum. The zealous faith engendered by scourge and whip in the rue chambers were captured in this ring, forged from barbs that once mortified the flesh of early converts to the order." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Band of Untold Secrets
flavor: In certain light the intricate runes of a long forgotten language can be made out upon the surface of this ring.

name: The Barber

custom.name: Spirit Barrage Explosion Damage
custom.format: Instead of dealing direct damage, your Spirit Barrage now accumulates on the target. When you stop casting, it explodes dealing %d%% of the accumulated damage to all enemies within 15 yards.

flavor: A precision instrument for a master of the blade.

name: The Barber

custom.name: Spirit Barrage Explosion Damage
custom.format: Instead of dealing direct damage, your Spirit Barrage now accumulates on the target. When you stop casting, it explodes dealing %d%% of the accumulated damage to all enemies within 15 yards.

flavor: A precision instrument for a master of the blade.

name: The Barber
flavor: A precision instrument for a master of the blade.

name: Bastion's Revered
flavor: Used by the leaders of Bastion's Keep during the war with the northern tribes.

name: Bastion's Revered

custom.name: Extra Frenzy Stacks
custom.format: Frenzy now stacks up to 10 times.

flavor: Used by the leaders of Bastion�s Keep in the war with the Northern Tribes. The Barbarians came to respect the weapon so much that they gave it a name, shortly after tearing it from the hands of a dying garrison commander.

name: Beckon Sail

custom.name: Smoke Screen on Fatal Damage
custom.format: When receiving fatal damage, you instead automatically cast Smoke Screen and are healed to 25%% Life. This effect may occur once every 120 seconds.

flavor: Favored by those who do their fighting in the underworld.

name: Belt of the Trove

custom.name: Bombardment Rate
custom.format: Every %d seconds, call down Bombardment on a random nearby enemy.

flavor: Rumors have persisted for centuries that the crusaders maintain a secret bunker in Kehjistan, filled with ancient relics of unbelievable power. When the need is great, Crusaders are allowed to borrow one of these relics. The existence of this crusader belt would seem to confirm the existence of this bunker.

name: Belt of Transcendence

custom.name: Summon Sycophants
custom.format: Summon a Fetish Sycophant when you hit with a Mana spender.

flavor: Witch doctors learned long ago that some spirits wish to visit our world, and that certain materials will act as a beacon to them.

name: Bezoar Stone
flavor: This stone has passed through much to attain its magical properties.

name: Binding of the Lost

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: Each hit with Seven-Sided Strike grants %.1f%% damage reduction for 7 seconds.

flavor: All that was ever found of Uliana after her disappearance.

name: Binding of the Lost

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: Each hit with Seven-Sided Strike grants %.1f%% damage reduction for 7 seconds.

flavor: All that was ever found of Uliana after her disappearance.

name: Bindings of the Lesser Gods

custom.name: Mystic Ally Damage Bonus
custom.format: Enemies hit by your Cyclone Strike take %d%% increased damage from your Mystic Ally for 5 seconds.

flavor: For those who may not be sufficiently holy to find refuge in Inna�s arms.

name: Blackfeather

custom.name: Counter Rocket Damage
custom.format: Dodging or getting hit by a ranged attack automatically shoots a homing rocket back at the attacker for %d%% weapon damage as Physical.

flavor: This cloak matches the description of the one worn by the hero in the popular children's tale Yorgie and the Giants.

name: Blackguard
flavor: The power of this sword drove the warrior Rothat to unspeakable acts.

name: Blackhand Key
flavor: The spine of the urdar is known to possess unique magical properties that unlock arcane secrets for those brave enough to wield it.

name: Blade of Prophecy

custom.name: Condemn Explosions Chain
custom.format: Two Condemned enemies also trigger Condemn's explosion and the damage of Condemn is increased by 100%%.

flavor: The Blade of Prophecy was lost until a champion worthy to carry it into battle emerged.

name: Blade of Prophecy

custom.name: Condemn Explosions Chain
custom.format: Two Condemned enemies also trigger Condemn's explosion and the damage of Condemn is increased by %d%%.

flavor: The Blade of Prophecy was lost until a champion worthy to carry it into battle emerged.

name: Blade of the Tribes

custom.name: Warcries Cause Avalanche and Earthquake
custom.format: War Cry and Threatening Shout cause an Avalanche and Earthquake.

flavor: Every tribe tells tales of their greatest weapons, capable of moving mountains or terrifying enemies, each one different. But every tribe claims this blade as their own.

name: Blade of the Warlord
flavor: Awrak led the people of the Bear tribe to a great many victories in his all-too-short life. His name is still highly revered among his people.

name: Blade of the Warlord

custom.name: Bash Damage Bonus
custom.format: Bash consumes up to 40 Fury to deal up to %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Awrak led the people of the Bear tribe to a great many victories in his all-too-short life. His name is still highly revered among his people.

name: Blessed of Haull

custom.name: Justice Spawns Blessed Hammer
custom.format: Justice spawns a Blessed Hammer when it hits an enemy.

flavor: The Crusader Haull traveled with three others; Inhora, Drakon, and Roland. They shared knowledge and wine. While instructing his apprentice in the application of Justice the next day, Haull was struck by an insight, and set to work modifying his belt.

name: Blind Faith
flavor: Do not trust your eyes; they can deceive you.

name: Blitzbolter
flavor: Good for putting the dead back in the ground.

name: Blood Brother

custom.name: Chance to Block
custom.format: Grants a %d%% chance to block attacks. Blocked attacks inflict 30%% less damage. After blocking an attack, your next attack inflicts 30%% additional damage.

flavor: "Long ago, the demon Vi'inaz and his brother Eboeth were terrible foes of the High Heavens, though they bickered constantly. In later times, Vi'inaz alone was seen wielding a sword wrapped in demon flesh, with a still-beating heart pumping black blood along its sharp-spined length. Talus'ar does not record the fate of Eboeth, but I do not place our foes above perverse fratricide." �Archangel Ithereal

name: Blood-Magic Edge

custom.name: Blood oozes from you
custom.format: Blood oozes from you.

flavor: The taste of blood unleashes a magic few can control.

name: Bloodsong Mail

custom.name: Command Skeletons Damage
custom.format: While in the Land of the Dead, Command Skeletons deals %d%% additional damage and gains the effect of the Enforcer, Frenzy, Dark Mending and Freezing Grasp runes.

flavor: The rustling of the scales sounds like a spray of blood hitting the ground.

name: Bloodtide Blade

custom.name: Death Nova Damage per Enemy
custom.format: Death Nova deals %d%% increased damage for every enemy within 25 yards.

flavor: The favored weapon of Master Necromancer Ordan, renowned teacher of the Priests of Rathma. He was so devoted to this weapon that he would rather part with his life than have it leave his side.

name: Bloodtide Blade

custom.name: Death Nova Damage per Enemy
custom.format: Death Nova deals %d%% increased damage for every enemy within 25 yards.

flavor: The favored weapon of Master Necromancer Ordan, renowned teacher of the Priests of Rathma. He was so devoted to this weapon that he would rather part with his life than have it leave his side.

name: Board Walkers
flavor: Well worn, but still sturdy, these boots look as if they have traveled all the lands of Sanctuary many times over.

name: Boj Anglers
flavor: Do not overlook the importance of a good boot.

name: Bombardier's Rucksack

custom.name: Extra Sentries
custom.format: You may have 2 additional Sentries.

flavor: Designed by a watchmaker's apprentice turned demon hunter, this rucksack makes use of its maker's knowledge of clockworks to greatly miniaturize the turret mechanism, allowing its owner to field more of the devices without the case being any more heavy or cumbersome than an ordinary quiver.

name: Bone Ringer

custom.name: Command Skeleton Damage Bonus
custom.format: The damage bonus of Command Skeletons increases by %d%% per second they spend attacking the same target.

flavor: When this bell tolls, the dead will always answer.

name: Boots of Disregard

custom.name: Regeneration While Standing Still
custom.format: Gain 10000 Life regeneration per Second for each second you stand still. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

flavor: "Even idleness can be well spent." �Ancient Caldeum proverb

name: Bovine Bardiche

custom.name: Chance to Summon Cows
custom.format: Chance on hit to summon a herd of murderous cows.

flavor: This polearm was crafted by the finest ungulate smiths�its blade fired in the Hellforge, quenched in the rancid milk of the Cow King, and enchanted by that selfsame monarch. In addition to its significant martial benefits, the Bovine Bardiche may also summon forth a veritable army of cows to fight on its wielder's behalf.

name: Bracer of Fury

custom.name: Heaven's Fury Damage on Blinded
custom.format: Heaven's Fury deals %d%% increased damage to enemies that are Blinded, Immobilized, or Stunned.

flavor: Those that cannot see the truth of the Light will suffer its wrath.

name: Bracer of Fury

custom.name: Heaven's Fury Damage on Blinded
custom.format: Heaven's Fury deals %d%% increased damage to enemies that are Blinded, Immobilized, or Stunned.

flavor: Those that cannot see the truth of the Light will suffer its wrath.

name: Bracers of Destruction

custom.name: Seismic Slam Damage Increase
custom.format: Seismic Slam deals %d%% increased damage to the first 5 enemies it hits.

flavor: �These bracers appear to utilize primal forces channeled from the ground itself. Interesting, to say the least.� -Abd al-hazir

name: Bracers of Destruction

custom.name: Seismic Slam Damage Increase
custom.format: Seismic Slam deals %d%% increased damage to the first 5 enemies it hits.

flavor: �These bracers appear to utilize primal forces channeled from the ground itself. Interesting, to say the least.� -Abd al-hazir

name: Bracers of the First Men

custom.name: HotA Damage
custom.format: Hammer of the Ancients attacks 50%% faster and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: �I do not care if these were forged in long dead furnaces by the Ancients themselves. They help me crush my enemies; that is all that matters.� -Aletur of Sescheron

name: Bracers of the First Men

custom.name: HotA Damage
custom.format: Hammer of the Ancients attacks 50%% faster and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: �I do not care if these were forged in long dead furnaces by the Ancients themselves. They help me crush my enemies; that is all that matters.� -Aletur of Sescheron

name: Briggs' Wrath

custom.name: Curses Pull Enemies
custom.format: Uncursed enemies are pulled to the target location when a curse is applied to them.

flavor: "Let fear strike my enemies in the moment of their greatest weakness. Let their suffering embalm them as death comes." �Passage from the Prayer of Briggs

name: Broken Crown
flavor: The ancient crown of Rakkis, first ruler of Westmarch.

name: Broken Crown

custom.name: Extra Gem Drops
custom.format: Whenever a gem drops, a gem of the type socketed into your helmet also drops. This effect does not apply to Legendary Gems.

flavor: The ancient crown of Rakkis, first ruler of Westmarch.

name: Broken Promises

custom.name: Critical Boost Duration
custom.format: After 5 consecutive non-critical hits, your chance to critically hit is increased to 100%% for %d seconds.

flavor: A great melancholy has been known to strike those who wear this ring. Archaic hieroglyphs inscribed on its band tell a tale of unrelenting heartbreak and sorrow.

name: Broken Promises
flavor: A great melancholy has been known to strike those who wear this ring. Archaic hieroglyphs inscribed on its band tell a tale of unrelenting heartbreak and sorrow.

name: The Broken Staff
flavor: Master Kirill's prized staff until it was damaged in combat with the demon Ashukal.

name: Bryner's Journey

custom.name: Chance to Cast Bone Nova
custom.format: Attacking with Bone Spikes has a %d%% chance to cast a Bone Nova at the target location.

flavor: Though they have seen every corner of Sanctuary, these boots seem ready for another adventure.

name: Bul-Kathos's Wedding Band

custom.name: Drain Life
custom.format: You drain life from enemies around you.

flavor: Forged in the city of Harrogath to commemorate a day sacred to the barbarians.

name: Buriza-Do Kyanon

custom.name: Projectiles Pierce
custom.format: Your projectiles pierce %d additional times.

flavor: Previously thought to be too large and cumbersome to be wielded by hand, the Buriza-Do Kyanon is handled by the superior warrior with ease.

name: The Burning Axe of Sankis

custom.name: Chance to Ignore Pain
custom.format: Chance to fight through the pain when enemies hit you.

flavor: An obsidian axe wielded by the mad Sankis as he turned on his own men inside their fortress. Even as he burned to death himself, he would not stop his attacks on those he had once ruled.

name: Burst of Wrath

custom.name: Chance to Gain Resource on Kill
custom.format: Killing enemies and destroying objects has a chance to grant 20%% of your maximum primary resource.

flavor: Zaboul, the Lord of Wrath, forged this weapon after the Prime Evils declared they would not invade the world of Sanctuary. A thousand demons died in the process.

name: Butcher's Carver

custom.name: The Butcher still inhabits his carver
custom.format: The Butcher still inhabits his carver.

flavor: Foul weapon of the resurrected Butcher demon. Perfect for carving fresh meat.

name: The Butcher's Sickle

custom.name: Chance to Drag Enemies
custom.format: %d%% chance to drag enemies to you when attacking.

flavor: Used by the Butcher demon to snare and drag victims closer that he may feed on their flesh.

name: Calamity

custom.name: Enemies Become Marked for Death
custom.format: Automatically cast Marked for Death when you damage an enemy.

flavor: Slender and refined, this weapon is the antithesis of a traditional, rough-hewn and unwieldy crossbow. Obviously the result of loving craftsmanship by a master armsmaker.

name: Cam's Rebuttal

custom.name: Falling Sword can be cast twice
custom.format: Falling Sword can be used again within 4 seconds before the cooldown is triggered.

flavor: This massive holy weapon was once owned by an overzealous paladin named Cam. The blade earned its name when Cam was confronted by a strange warrior from the east who claimed that a darkness coiled at the heart of the Zakarum faith, one that threatened to undo its good works. Cam listened politely to the claims, then with a scream of "Blasphemer!" lopped off the shocked stranger's head.

name: The Cape of the Dark Night

custom.name: Drop Caltrops When Hit
custom.format: Automatically drop Caltrops when you are hit. This effect may only occur once every 6 seconds.

flavor: "Those who seek to do evil are a cowardly and superstitious lot." �Demon Hunter Bayne

name: Carnevil

custom.name: Fetishes Shoot Darts
custom.format: The 5 Fetishes closest to you will shoot a powerful Poison Dart every time you do.

flavor: Near the shoreline of the Torajan Jungle lies Lake Ymirson. Here are found the palms from which the Umbaru derive the poison for their darts. This ornate mask is carved from one of these palms, and beads of poisonous sap ooze forth from it, providing the witch doctor wearing it with easy access to fresh, and more concentrated, venom.

name: Cesar's Memento

custom.name: Tempest Rush Damage Bonus
custom.format: Enemies take %d%% increased damage from your Tempest Rush for 5 seconds after you hit them with a Blind, Freeze, or Stun.

flavor: Against the will of the Patriarchs, Cesar kept a lock of her hair, weaving it into his bracers. They filled him with calm, just as she always had. He never spoke of her again, but neither did he forget.

name: Cesar's Memento

custom.name: Tempest Rush Damage Bonus
custom.format: Enemies take %d%% increased damage from your Tempest Rush for 5 seconds after you hit them with a Blind, Freeze, or Stun.

flavor: Against the will of the Patriarchs, Cesar kept a lock of her hair, weaving it into his bracers. They filled him with calm, just as she always had. He never spoke of her again, but neither did he forget.

name: Chain of Shadows

custom.name: Free Impale After Vault
custom.format: After using Impale, Vault costs no resource for 2 seconds.

flavor: �Some theorized that hunters like Kunai harnessed the power of shadows to accomplish feats beyond the ken of mere mortals. Preposterous.�- Abd al-Hazir

name: Chaingmail

custom.name: Heal After Survival
custom.format: After earning a survival bonus, quickly heal to full Life.

flavor: The magical properties of a piece of armor such as this intrigue the mind. It was constructed from the finest parts of many different armors that were worn by many different heroes.

name: Chanon Bolter

custom.name: Lure Cooldown on Spike Traps
custom.format: Your Spike Traps lure enemies to them. Enemies may be taunted once every %d seconds.

flavor: The gross ornamentation of this crossbow belies the solid construction and powerful draw weight that make it a deadly weapon. As bowyer to King Leoric, Chanon was ordered to produce a crossbow capable of defeating the forces of Westmarch or watch his family be put to the sword. Chanon complied, creating this masterpiece, which the Mad King promptly tested on the hapless craftsman.

name: Chilanik's Chain

custom.name: War Cry Speed Increase
custom.format: Using War Cry increases the movement speed for you and all allies affected by %d%% for 10 seconds.

flavor: Chilanik forged this belt under specific instructions from Worusk himself. At the height of the Immortal King's powers, most foes fled rather than face him, and this fact vexed Worusk greatly. But Chilanik's Chain allowed Worusk to catch even the swiftest of enemies so he might show them the consequences of challenging the Immortal King or his realm.

name: Cinder Switch

custom.name: Chance to Cast Fireball
custom.format: %d%% chance to cast a fireball when attacking.

flavor: Ensorcelled with the essence of living flame.

name: Cindercoat

custom.name: Fire Skills Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the resource cost of Fire skills by %d%%.

flavor: One could withstand the fires of Hell itself wearing armor such as this.

name: Circle of Nailuj's Evol

custom.name: Extra Skeletal Mage Duration
custom.format: You now raise an additional Skeletal Mage with each cast and they last an additional %d seconds.

flavor: Like the Great Cycle of Being, this ring has no beginning and no end. Named for its owner, the Master Necromancer Nailuj, it has aided many in their trials, and has been eagerly sought ever since.

name: Cloak of Deception

custom.name: Chance to Avoid Missiles
custom.format: Enemy missiles sometimes pass through you harmlessly.

flavor: This iridescent cloak, woven from the silk of starlight butterfly larvae, serves to twist sight around it, like a mirage rising off the desert sands.

name: The Cloak of Garwulf

custom.name: Extra Wolves
custom.format: Companion - Wolf Companion now summons 3 wolves.

flavor: The cloak of one with an affinity toward wolves.

name: Cluckeye

custom.name: Chance to Cluck
custom.format: %d%% chance to cluck when attacking.

flavor: This bow has been tainted by some strange magic indeed.

name: Coils of the First Spider

custom.name: Firebats Life on Hit
custom.format: While channeling Firebats, you gain 30%% damage reduction and %d Life per Hit.

flavor: It is claimed that Arachyr was able to restore the vital life essence of his followers by using creatures spawned from the realm that lies between our world and the Unformed Land.

name: Convention of Elements

custom.name: Elemental Damage
custom.format: Gain %d%% increased damage to a single element for 4 seconds. This effect rotates through the elements available to your class in the following order: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Holy, Lightning, Physical, Poison.

flavor: Long ago, a great conclave of mage-smiths convened during a blizzard to channel their collective energy into a single artifact, forging a powerful ring that bestowed upon the wielder mastery over all of the elements.

name: Cord of the Sherma

custom.name: Chaos Field Duration
custom.format: Chance on hit to create a chaos field that Blinds and Slows enemies inside for %d seconds.

flavor: "During battle, confusion quickly gives way to panic, and a frightened enemy is the easiest to defeat." �Rakkis's Strategies of War

name: Cord of the Sherma

custom.name: Chaos Field Duration
custom.format: Chance on hit to create a chaos field that Blinds and Slows enemies inside for %d seconds.

flavor: "During battle, confusion quickly gives way to panic, and a frightened enemy is the easiest to defeat." �Rakkis's Strategies of War

name: Corpsewhisper Pauldrons

custom.name: Corpse Lance Damage per Stack
custom.format: Corpse Lance damage is increased by %d%% for 3 seconds when you consume a corpse. Max 20 stacks.

flavor: Commune with the dead. Speak in their tongue. Learn their secrets.

name: Corrupted Ashbringer

custom.name: Burn Damage
custom.format: Chance on kill to raise a skeleton to fight for you. Upon accumulating 5 skeletons, they explode for 1000%% weapon damage and the sword transforms into Ashbringer for a short time. Attacking with Ashbringer burns your target for %d%% weapon damage as Holy.

flavor: Stories tell of a great paladin who wore a single gauntlet of silver and wielded a mighty sword with a flashing jewel. He dispatched thousands of Risen Dead and Wretched Mothers, but fell to a tragic end. This sword bears some resemblance to the legends, but its jewel is dark and threatening. Perhaps there is more to the story?

name: Corruption
flavor: The alchemist Lyekurn spent many years formulating the exact shape and nature of this armor so that it would draw upon the power of Azmodan, yet keep the wearer safe from his corrupting influence.

name: Cosmic Strand

custom.name: Teleport Gains Wormhole
custom.format: Teleport gains the effect of the Wormhole rune.

flavor: Holds the secret to existence for those who can decipher its intricate design.

name: Countess Julia's Cameo

custom.name: Arcane Absorb
custom.format: Prevent all Arcane damage taken and heal yourself for %d%% of the amount prevented.

flavor: "Countess Julia attempted to put down the Cartolus Insurrection with her own personal guard, in an attempt to impress Justinian III. The effort failed miserably, as her guard was slaughtered and the uprising spread. Only the countess's enchanted cameo enabled her to survive this folly. It did not save her life, however, as King Justinian was so displeased, he had her tortured and then executed." �The History of Westmarch

name: Coven's Criterion

custom.name: Damage Reduction on Block
custom.format: You take %d%% less damage from blocked attacks.

flavor: By bearing the arms of your enemy, you risk surrendering that which divides you from your foe.

name: Crashing Rain

custom.name: Crashing Beast Damage
custom.format: Rain of Vengeance also summons a crashing beast that deals %d%% weapon damage.

flavor: When it rains, it crashes.

name: Crown of the Primus

custom.name: Slow Time Gains All Runes
custom.format: Slow Time gains the effect of every rune.

flavor: The Peace Warder Radaugh was a singular being who had the powers of time itself at his command. Unfortunately, this frequently left him in a befuddled state, allowing the upstart cultist Vess to kill him and take the prized Crown of the Primus for his own.

name: The Crudest Boots
flavor: You've got to mind those feets.

name: The Crudest Boots

custom.name: Double Mystic Ally
custom.format: Mystic Ally summons two Mystic Allies that fight by your side.

flavor: You've got to mind those feets.

name: Crushbane
flavor: Many are the warriors who have fled in terror from the awesome might that is Crushbane.

name: Crystal Fist

custom.name: Dashing Strike Damage Reduction
custom.format: Dashing Strike reduces your damage taken by %d%% for 6 seconds.

flavor: Indestructible, pure and clear. So the body follows the mind.

name: Crystal Fist
flavor: Indestructible, pure and clear. So the body follows the mind.

name: Custerian Wristguards

custom.name: Gold to Experience
custom.format: Picking up gold grants experience.

flavor: "In ancient times, there lived a strange race of people�the Custerians. No one knows who they were, or what they were doing, but their legacy remains beaten into the very metal of these wristguards." �Yuan, wise man of Tufnyl

name: The Dagger of Darts

custom.name: Poison Darts Pierce
custom.format: Your Poison Darts and your Fetishes' Poison Darts now pierce.

flavor: Nothing infuriates a fetish more than ineffectual darts.

name: Dark Mage's Shade

custom.name: Automatic Diamond Skin Cooldown
custom.format: Automatically cast Diamond Skin when you fall below 35%% Life. This effect may occur once every %d seconds.

flavor: The scrolls in the Yshari Sanctum speak with somber tones of the dark mage Garesh. Could the runes on this hat really mark it as his?

name: Darklight

custom.name: Chance to Cast Extra Fist of the Heavens
custom.format: Fist of the Heavens has a %d%% chance to also be cast at your location.

flavor: The cold-tempered steel of this weapon cradles a mote of pale light. Ancient beyond measure, its creator and original purpose is unknown, but the flail is now revered by the crusaders as a symbol for the role they play in the world: a light to pierce the darkness.

name: Darklight

custom.name: Chance to Cast Fist of the Heavens Twice
custom.format: Fist of the Heavens has a %d%% chance to be cast twice.

flavor: The cold-tempered steel of this weapon cradles a mote of pale light. Ancient beyond measure, its creator and original purpose is unknown, but the flail is now revered by the crusaders as a symbol for the role they play in the world: a light to pierce the darkness.

name: Dawn
flavor: Energy that shimmers in the morning light leaps from the surface of this crossbow.

name: Dawn

custom.name: Vengeance Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Reduce the cooldown of Vengeance by %d%%.

flavor: Calm pervades your soul as you are warmed by the morning�s first light, for you know vengeance will soon be yours.

name: Dayntee's Binding

custom.name: Decrepify Damage Reduction
custom.format: You gain an additional %d%% damage reduction when there is an enemy afflicted by any of your curses.

flavor: Once worn by a steadfast soul with a taste for victory.

name: Dayntee's Binding

custom.name: Decrepify Damage Reduction
custom.format: You gain an additional %d%% damage reduction when there is an enemy afflicted by your Decrepify.

flavor: Once worn by a steadfast soul with a taste for victory.

name: Dead Man's Legacy

custom.name: Double Multishot Threshold
custom.format: Multishot hits enemies below %d%% health twice and its damage is increased by 100%%.

flavor: "Marteks would not flee before their superior numbers. He knew the time of his death was at hand. He stood his ground, loosing arrow after arrow as he was slowly overwhelmed." �Tales of the Wasteland

name: Dead Man's Legacy

custom.name: Multishot Damage Bonus
custom.format: Multishot hits enemies below 60%% health twice and its damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: "Marteks would not flee before their superior numbers. He knew the time of his death was at hand. He stood his ground, loosing arrow after arrow as he was slowly overwhelmed." �Tales of the Wasteland

name: Dead Man's Legacy
flavor: "Marteks would not flee before their superior numbers. He knew the time of his death was at hand. He stood his ground, loosing arrow after arrow as he was slowly overwhelmed." �Tales of the Wasteland

name: Deadly Rebirth

custom.name: Grasp of the Dead Gains Rain of Corpses
custom.format: Grasp of the Dead gains the effect of the Rain of Corpses rune.

flavor: The restless dead are drawn up from the earth by the presence of this blade.

name: Death Watch Mantle

custom.name: Chance to Cast Fan of Knives
custom.format: %d%% chance to explode in a fan of knives for 200%% weapon damage when hit.

flavor: These vicious pads draw their power from the very life force of your enemies.

name: Death Watch Mantle

custom.name: Fan of Knives Chance/Damage
custom.format: %d%% chance to explode in a fan of knives for 750-950%% weapon damage when hit.

flavor: These vicious pads draw their power from the very life force of your enemies.

name: Death's Bargain

custom.name: Regeneration to Damage
custom.format: Gain an aura of death that deals %d%% of your Life per Second as Physical damage to enemies within 16 yards. You no longer regenerate Life.

flavor: "Rumors persist that these baleful breeches were won from Malthael himself in a game of chance. Though the pants offer a significant advantage in combat, they never cease draining the vitality of those around them, as the unfortunate cardsharp learned only after bringing about the demise of his entire household. It would appear the Angel of Death is a sore loser." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Deathseer's Cowl

custom.name: Chance to Charm Undead
custom.format: %d%% chance on being hit by an Undead enemy to charm it for 2 seconds.

flavor: "Given their bloody history, I cannot imagine anyone venturing into the southern jungles looking for the Opaya. Nor can I imagine the madman who could confront the Opayan deathseers and walk out of Torajan with one of their hoods." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Deathwish

custom.name: Damage Increase While Channeling
custom.format: While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, all damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. The aptly-named Deathwish was the last weapon he forged. Despairing over his unhappy life, Peerse decided to craft his masterwork. Pulling the red-hot blade from the forge, the smith fell upon it, quenching the sword in his own blood and imbuing it with an arcane shard of his very soul.

name: Deathwish

custom.name: Damage Increase While Channeling
custom.format: While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, all damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. The aptly-named Deathwish was the last weapon he forged. Despairing over his unhappy life, Peerse decided to craft his masterwork. Pulling the red-hot blade from the forge, the smith fell upon it, quenching the sword in his own blood and imbuing it with an arcane shard of his very soul.

name: Defender of Westmarch

custom.name: Charging Wolf Damage
custom.format: Blocks have a chance of summoning a charging wolf that deals %d%% weapon damage to all enemies it passes through.

flavor: This aged, wolf-crested shield bears scars from hundreds of battles. It was presented to the original Knight Commander of Westmarch by King Korsikk as the first official act after his coronation. Since then, it has been borne by many of the order's greatest heroes, and its bearer is accorded all the respect such a badge of honor deserves.

name: Defender of Westmarch

custom.name: Charging Wolf Damage
custom.format: Blocks have a chance of summoning a charging wolf that deals %d%% weapon damage to all enemies it passes through.

flavor: This aged, wolf-crested shield bears scars from hundreds of battles. It was presented to the original Knight Commander of Westmarch by King Korsikk as the first official act after his coronation. Since then, it has been borne by many of the order's greatest heroes, and its bearer is accorded all the respect such a badge of honor deserves.

name: Defiler Cuisses

custom.name: Bone Spirit Damage per Stack
custom.format: Your Bone Spirit's damage is increased by %d%% for every second it is active.

flavor: Walk as though you are one with the night.

name: Defiler Cuisses

custom.name: Bone Spirit Damage per Stack
custom.format: Your Bone Spirit's damage is increased by %d%% for every second it is active.

flavor: Walk as though you are one with the night.

name: Demon Claw
flavor: The only student to survive the Demon Road returned with her hand cut off. A smoldering claw was sewn in its place.

name: Demon Machine

custom.name: Chance to Shoot Explosive Bolts
custom.format: %d%% chance to shoot explosive bolts when attacking.

flavor: "All maddening angles and gnashing gears. These crossbows! How do they work?!" �Sergeant at Arms Carlavoie

name: The Demon's Demise
flavor: �Whispers abound of Kovan's insatiable lust for slaughtering the denizens of the Burning Hells. May the gods save the world if the day comes when he no longer has demons to fight� -Tales of the Wasteland

name: The Demon's Demise

custom.name: Spike Trap Echo
custom.format: The blast from Spike Trap will damage all enemies again after 1 second.

flavor: �Whispers abound of Kovan's insatiable lust for slaughtering the denizens of the Burning Hells. May the gods save the world if the day comes when he no longer has demons to fight� -Tales of the Wasteland

name: Denial

custom.name: Sweep Attack Bonus
custom.format: Each enemy hit by your Sweep Attack increases the damage of your next Sweep Attack by %d%%, stacking up to 5 times.

flavor: A veritable wall of wood and iron denying those who would seek to do you harm.

name: Denial

custom.name: Sweep Attack Bonus
custom.format: Each enemy hit by your Sweep Attack increases the damage of your next Sweep Attack by %d%%, stacking up to 5 times.

flavor: A veritable wall of wood and iron denying those who would seek to do you harm.

name: Denial
flavor: A veritable wall of wood and iron denying those who would seek to do you harm.

name: Depth Diggers

custom.name: Increased Primary Skill Damage
custom.format: Primary skills that generate resource deal %d%% additional damage.

flavor: Those planning on plumbing the depths of ancient tombs in search of treasure would do well to wear these pants.

name: Depth Diggers
flavor: Those planning on plumbing the depths of ancient tombs in search of treasure would do well to wear these pants.

name: Devastator
flavor: The ground cracks and disintegrates with each strike.

name: Devil Tongue
flavor: The awful, intricate contours of this imposing sword are the key to its unbridled power.

name: Dishonored Legacy

custom.name: Cleave Extra Damage
custom.format: Cleave deals up to %d%% increased damage based on percentage of missing Fury.

flavor: Many myths seek to explain the origins of this enormous blade. The styling is true of ancient barbarian tribes, but the proportions of the unbroken blade would have made wielding the weapon impossible, even for the largest of the northern warriors.

name: Doombringer
flavor: A mysterious blade shall appear to the mighty warrior when his lands are ripped asunder, ushering in a new epoch from the ashes of the old.

name: Dovu Energy Trap

custom.name: Extra Stun Duration
custom.format: Increases duration of Stun effects by %d%%.

flavor: "Those unaware of the true nature of the world are unable to keep their spirits from being used against them." �Dovu, the Tribe of the Clouded Valley

name: Drakon's Lesson

custom.name: Increased Shield Bash Damage
custom.format: When your Shield Bash hits 3 or fewer enemies, its damage is increased by %d%% and 25%% of its Wrath Cost is refunded.

flavor: The Elder Crusader Drakon believed in precision, and trained his apprentice to strike fewer targets, but with more power. "Would you rather face ten opponents who are slightly injured? Or seven healthy opponents, who are distracted by the three corpses at your feet?"

name: Drakon's Lesson

custom.name: Increased Shield Bash Damage
custom.format: When your Shield Bash hits 3 or fewer enemies, its damage is increased by %d%% and 25%% of its Wrath Cost is refunded.

flavor: The Elder Crusader Drakon believed in precision, and trained his apprentice to strike fewer targets, but with more power. "Would you rather face ten opponents who are slightly injured? Or seven healthy opponents, who are distracted by the three corpses at your feet?"

name: Dread Iron

custom.name: Ground Stomp Causes Avalance
custom.format: Ground Stomp causes an Avalanche.

flavor: Forged from armor found in the aftermath of the destruction of Mount Arreat.

name: Dread Iron
flavor: Forged from armor found in the aftermath of the destruction of Mount Arreat.

name: Eberli Charo

custom.name: Heaven's Fury Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the cooldown of Heaven's Fury by %d%%.

flavor: When their caravans are threatened, the Vecin will supplement their meager weapons and armor with whatever materials they have on hand. This unremarkable wooden shield has been adorned with countless charms and enchantments meant to protect its wielder, from the magical silk that has been wrapped around its surface to the glowing pendants and jingling mystical trinkets that dangle from the shield's rim.

name: Echoing Fury
flavor: The sound of each strike instills terror in the hearts of those who hear it.

name: Elusive Ring

custom.name: Damage Reduction on Defensive Skills
custom.format: After casting Shadow Power, Smoke Screen, or Vault, take %d%% reduced damage for 8 seconds.

flavor: You are harder to hit when you can�t be found.

name: Emimei's Duffel

custom.name: Bolas now explode instantly
custom.format: Bolas now explode instantly.

flavor: "Emimei was rumored to be the offspring of the famed fletcher Cirri. Possibly even more talented than her father, she discovered a way to integrate a superior ignition system into demon hunter bola weapons. Exert enough pressure on a bola's spike and the explosive charge within triggers, causing the bola to detonate upon impact with a target." �The Craft of War by Diadra the Scholar

name: Empyrean Messenger
flavor: This spear has seen many a battle during the Eternal Conflict.

name: Enchanting Favor

custom.name: Follower Cannot Die
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.

flavor: A diaphanous scarf given as a token of affection from a lady fair.

name: Envious Blade

custom.name: Critical Hit Against Full Health
custom.format: Gain 100%% Critical Hit Chance against enemies at full health.

flavor: "All who chance to behold it, desire it. Those who possess it must shed blood to keep it. And those who deem themselves above its allure are the most endangered by it." �Lam Esen on the nature of the blade

name: Erlang Shen
flavor: Erlang Shen overcame much to slay the flood dragon and awaken his third eye.

name: The Ess of Johan

custom.name: Slow Amount After Pull
custom.format: Chance on hit to pull in enemies toward your target and Slow them by %d%%.

flavor: "A variation on the retreat and ambush stratagem uses the Ess of Johan most effectively. First, send out a small group of soldiers to confront the enemy and create the appearance of being overwhelmed. When they retreat, the enemy will follow to finish them off. Just as the pursuing force realizes it's been led into a trap, employ the artifact to deny its escape." �Rakkis's Strategies of War

name: Etched Sigil

custom.name: Channeling Skills Cast Other Skills
custom.format: Your Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, and Ray of Frost also cast one of your other damaging Arcane Power Spenders every second.

flavor: �When you gaze long into the arcane realm, the arcane realm also gazes into you.� - Zoltun Kulle

name: Etched Sigil

custom.name: Spender Damage Bonus
custom.format: While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, the damage of your Arcane Power Spenders is increased by %d%% and you also cast one of your other damaging Arcane Power Spenders every second.

flavor: �When you gaze long into the arcane realm, the arcane realm also gazes into you.� - Zoltun Kulle

name: Eternal Union

custom.name: Triple Phalanx Duration
custom.format: Increases the duration of Phalanx avatars by 200%%.

flavor: �The guardians of the righteous cleave to those whose existence is a virtuous one.� -The Precepts of Akkhan

name: Eternal Union
flavor: This ring seems to become one with those who wear it.

name: Etrayu
flavor: The warrior surveyed the dead and dying arrayed about him. There would be more�many more. He felt as if he were trapped in a tale that would never end.

name: Etrayu
flavor: The warrior surveyed the dead and dying arrayed about him. There would be more�many more. He felt as if he were trapped in a tale that would never end.

name: Eun-jang-do

custom.name: Freeze Threshold
custom.format: Attacking enemies below %d%% Life freezes them for 3 seconds.

flavor: These Xiansai daggers of silver and steel were often carried by Sisters of the Sightless Eye, engraved with oaths of fidelity to their cause. Enemies who closed quickly believed themselves safe from the Sister�s bow. And they were, but not from the Eun-jang-do.

name: Exarian
flavor: In days long past, the now-ruined city of Khamhalla was ruled by a wise nephalem king. The symbol of his authority was the sword Exarian, gifted to him by the Lady of Light. Legend has it that, though betrayed and gravely wounded during Khamhalla's fall, the king did not die, but was borne away across the sea to return when Sanctuary needs him again. The reappearance of Exarian heralds his return.

name: The Executioner
flavor: Stained with the blood of its many victims.

name: Eye of Etlich
flavor: Originally pulled from a frozen corpse on the slopes of Mount Arreat, the eye seethes with the magic of a dozen sorcerers.

name: Eye of Peshkov

custom.name: Breath of Heaven Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Reduce the cooldown of Breath of Heaven by %d%%.

flavor: "The mind sees most clearly when the eyes are shut." �High Abbot Peshkov

name: The Eye of the Storm
flavor: Ultimate power emerges only from the calm at its center.

name: Faithful Memory

custom.name: Blessed Hammer Bonus Damage
custom.format: Each enemy hit by Falling Sword increases the damage of Blessed Hammer by %d%% for 10 seconds. Max 10 stacks.

flavor: The Boosenian smiths forged swords with a technique centuries beyond their time. Few craftsmen have been able to replicate the quality of their work.

name: Faithful Memory

custom.format: Each enemy hit by Falling Sword increases the damage of Blessed Hammer by %d%% for 10 seconds. Max 10 stacks.

custom.format: You automatically start with %d Archon stacks when entering Archon form.

name: The Final Witness

custom.name: Shield Glare Hits All Enemies
custom.format: Shield Glare now hits all enemies around you.

flavor: "Our eyes are everywhere�in the tallest mountains and the lowest valleys. We go everywhere, and we see everything. We learn from our masters, who walked the lands before us. Our enemies may think we journey alone, but they are mistaken." �Crusader proverb

name: Fire Walkers

custom.name: Burn the Ground
custom.format: Burn the ground you walk on, dealing %d%% weapon damage each second.

flavor: Tradition has it that these boots were forged in the heart of the great Challsop Volcano.

name: Fire Walkers

custom.name: Burn the Ground

flavor: Tradition has it that these boots were forged in the heart of the great Challsop Volcano.

name: The Fist of Az'Turrasq

name: The Flavor of Time
flavor: This garish amulet, once worn by an over large imp, makes time an insignificant thing.

name: Fleeting Strap
flavor: "The demon hunter drew her crossbow faster than the eye could follow, impaling her targets before they could move against her." �Tales of the Wasteland

name: Flesh Tearer
flavor: The edges seem to become more jagged with each strike.

name: Fleshrake
flavor: The very sight of this weapon is enough to settle disputes that would otherwise lead to war.

name: Fleshrake

custom.name: Dashing Strike Damage Bonus
custom.format: Dashing Strike increases the damage of Dashing Strike by %d%% for 1 second, stacking up to 5 times.

flavor: The very sight of this weapon is enough to settle disputes that would otherwise lead to war.

name: Fletcher's Pride
flavor: The quality of these arrows is stunning. Even the fletchers of Jasender would be hard-pressed to match it.

name: The Flow of Eternity

custom.name: Seven-Sided Strike Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike by %d%%.

flavor: "When one's mind floats along the unseen trails that pulse through the world, one�s movements become effortless." �Dvorak, Sage of the Many

name: Flying Dragon

custom.name: Chance to Double Attack Speed
custom.format: Chance to double your attack speed when attacking.

flavor: The flying dragon soars silently but strikes with great force.

name: Fortress Ballista

custom.name: Attacks Grant Absorb Shield
custom.format: Attacks grant you an absorb shield for %.1f%% of your maximum Life. Stacks up to 10 times.

flavor: The Fortress Ballista was famously used by Valla during the Siege of Bastion�s Keep. A strangely garbed wizard infused it with a spell on the spur of the moment, apparently conjured from nothing, when it seemed their fate was sealed.

name: Fragment of Destiny
flavor: Thought to contain a shard of the Worldstone itself.

name: Fragment of Destiny

custom.name: Spectral Blade Damage Increase
custom.format: Spectral Blade attacks 50%% faster and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Thought to contain a shard of the Worldstone itself.

name: Freeze of Deflection

custom.name: Chance to Freeze on Block
custom.format: Blocking an attack has a chance to Freeze the attacker for %.1f seconds.

flavor: Ice is surprisingly resilient.

name: Frostburn

custom.format: Cold skills deal %d%% increased damage and have a 50%% chance to Freeze enemies.

flavor: These gauntlets drain the warmth from anything they touch.

name: Frostburn

custom.name: Chance to Freeze
custom.format: Your Cold damage has up to a %d%% chance to Freeze enemies.

flavor: These gauntlets drain the warmth from anything they touch.

name: Frydehr's Wrath

custom.name: Remove Condemn Cooldown
custom.format: Condemn has no cooldown and has its damage increased by 200%%, but instead costs 40 Wrath.

flavor: Frydehr was near death, his wounds outnumbered only by his foes. It was then that he discovered that the depth of a crusader�s wrath is far greater than anyone had ever suspected.

flavor: Frydehr was near death, his wounds outnumbered only by his foes. It was then that he discovered that the depth of a crusader�s wrath is far greater than anyone had ever suspected.

name: Fulminator

custom.name: Lightning Rod Damage
custom.format: Lightning damage has a chance to turn enemies into lightning rods, causing them to pulse %d%% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 6 seconds.

flavor: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. Made during Peerse's Early Period, Fulminator expresses, through blinding speed and arcing lightning strikes, its maker's youthful exuberance and the joy he found in his craft.

name: Fulminator

custom.name: Lightning Rod Damage
custom.format: Lightning damage has a chance to turn enemies into lightning rods, causing them to pulse %d%% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 6 seconds.

flavor: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. Made during Peerse's Early Period, Fulminator expresses, through blinding speed and arcing lightning strikes, its maker's youthful exuberance and the joy he found in his craft.

name: Funerary Pick

custom.name: Extra Siphon Blood Targets
custom.format: Siphon Blood drains blood from 2 additional targets.

flavor: Smooth as gleaming bone, this weapon could butcher a corpse in a matter of seconds in the right hands.

name: The Furnace

custom.name: Damage Against Elites
custom.format: Increases damage against elites by %d%%.

flavor: "This pestilence threatens to destroy our city, General Arenton. See that the plague dead are kept only in the Repository, and use this weapon to set their bodies aflame. Would that the memory of this tragedy could burn with them." �Justinian II, year 1200

name: Fury of the Ancients

custom.name: CotA Gains Ancients' Fury
custom.format: Call of the Ancients gains the effect of the Ancients' Fury rune.

flavor: This mantle was crafted by one banished from the sacred mountain, in order to commune with the ancients.

name: Fury of the Vanished Peak

custom.name: Seismic Slam Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the Fury cost of Seismic Slam by %d%% and increases its damage by 125%%.

flavor: Korr took all his anger and despair and poured them into the creation of a weapon that would speak to the majesty of Arreat for ages to come.

flavor: Korr took all his anger and despair and poured them into the creation of a weapon that would speak to the majesty of Arreat for ages to come.

name: Gabriel's Vambraces

custom.name: Blessed Hammer Cost Refund
custom.format: When your Blessed Hammer hits 3 or fewer enemies, %d%% of its Wrath Cost is refunded.

flavor: �Always seeking to improve the Crusaders� efficiency, Akkhan�s Master Blacksmith Gabriel crafted these bracers to ease the strain of summoning the Blessed Hammer.� -Rennold's Catalogue of Arms

name: The Gavel of Judgment

custom.name: Fury Returned
custom.format: The damage of Hammer of the Ancients is increased by %d%% and it returns 25 Fury if it hits 3 or fewer enemies.

flavor: A mighty symbol of Tyrael, the archangel of Justice, though never actually used by him. Stolen from the Courts of Justice in the High Heavens by renegade angels.

name: The Gavel of Judgment
flavor: A mighty symbol of Tyrael, the archangel of Justice, though never actually used by him. Stolen from the Courts of Justice in the High Heavens by renegade angels.

flavor: A mighty symbol of Tyrael, the archangel of Justice, though never actually used by him. Stolen from the Courts of Justice in the High Heavens by renegade angels.

custom.format: Spirit Barrage gains the Phantasm rune. Each active Phantasm increases the damage of Spirit Barrage by %d%%.

name: Gazing Demise
flavor: The eyes of fallen warriors peer into the darkness to see what you cannot.

name: Genzaniku

custom.name: Summon Fallen Champion
custom.format: Chance to summon a ghostly Fallen Champion when attacking.

flavor: "In the language of the fallen, 'genzaniku' means slayer of humans." �Deckard Cain

name: Gesture of Orpheus

custom.name: Slow Time Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by %d%%.

flavor: An old Skartaran legend tells of Orpheus rescuing his wife from the underworld using this wand.

custom.format: Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by %d%%.

flavor: An old Skartaran legend tells of Orpheus rescuing his wife from the underworld using this wand.

name: The Gidbinn

custom.name: Chance to Summon a Fetish
custom.format: Chance to summon a Fetish when attacking.

flavor: A powerful, holy artifact of the Skatsim religion. It was last seen in Kurast.

name: Gift of Silaria
flavor: Silaria, a renowned explorer, traveled the length and breadth of Sanctuary in search of adventure. This sword was designed with her compact build and lethally efficient fighting style in mind, and it is reputed to imbue its wielder with Silaria's prowess.

name: Girdle of Giants
flavor: No belt is too big. Except this one.

name: Girdle of Giants

custom.name: Earthquake Damage Bonus
custom.format: Seismic Slam increases Earthquake damage by %d%% for 3 seconds.

flavor: No belt is too big. Except this one.

custom.format: Seismic Slam increases Earthquake damage by %d%% for 3 seconds.

flavor: No belt is too big. Except this one.

name: Gladiator Gauntlets

custom.name: Gold on Massacre
custom.format: After earning a massacre bonus, gold rains from sky.

flavor: Worn by the combatants in the arenas of Emperor Vaught.

name: Gloves of Worship

custom.name: Extended Shrine Duration
custom.format: Shrine effects last for 10 minutes.

flavor: These scaled gloves, sewn from the flayed skin of a deceiver, are gifted only to the Dark Coven's most favored mortal servants.

name: Golden Flense

custom.name: Sweep Attack Damage
custom.format: Sweep Attack restores 6 Wrath for each enemy hit and has its damage increased by %d%%.

flavor: Covered in delicate Skatsimi runes, the blades of this ornate ancient weapon are sharp enough to draw blood with but a finger's caress.

name: Golden Flense

custom.name: Sweep Attack Restores Wrath
custom.format: Sweep Attack restores %d Wrath for each enemy hit and has its damage increased by 200%%.

flavor: Covered in delicate Skatsimi runes, the blades of this ornate ancient weapon are sharp enough to draw blood with but a finger's caress.

name: Golden Flense

custom.name: Sweep Attack Restores Wrath
custom.format: Sweep Attack restores %d Wrath for each enemy hit and has its damage increased by 200%%.

flavor: Covered in delicate Skatsimi runes, the blades of this ornate ancient weapon are sharp enough to draw blood with but a finger's caress.

name: Golden Gorget of Leoric

custom.name: Summon Skeletons
custom.format: After earning a massacre bonus, %d Skeletons are summoned to fight by your side for 10 seconds.

flavor: Despite the powerful enchantments upon it, this ornate piece of armor nonetheless failed to stop noble Lachdanan from ending the life of the Mad King.

name: Golden Scourge

custom.name: Smite Jumps to Additional Enemies
custom.format: Smite now jumps to 3 additional enemies.

flavor: Originally wielded by the crusader Anajinn, the Golden Scourge has felled numerous enemies of the Light. At one point, Anajinn's apprentice tried to count them all, and determined that their corpses would span the distance from Kurast to Westmarch�twice.

name: Goldskin

custom.name: Enemies drop gold on hit
custom.format: Chance for enemies to drop gold when you hit them.

flavor: The darkness of the low places is shattered by the raiment of gold.

name: Goldwrap

custom.name: Gold to Armor
custom.format: On gold pickup: Gain armor for 5 seconds equal to the amount picked up.

flavor: Crafted in the Amaral Mountains by the Kaniuga artisans, its fibers seem to draw gold from the very air.

name: Golemskin Breeches

custom.name: Golem Damage Bonus
custom.format: Your Golem's damage is increased by %d%% and you take 30%% less damage while it is alive.

flavor: Clad in the flesh of a golem, you begin to feel a greater affinity with them.

name: Golemskin Breeches

custom.name: Golem Damage Bonus
custom.format: The cooldown on Command Golem is reduced by %d seconds and you take 30%% less damage while your golem is alive.

flavor: Clad in the flesh of a golem, you begin to feel a greater affinity with them.

name: The Grand Vizier

custom.name: Reduce Meteor Cost
custom.format: Reduces the Arcane Power cost of Meteor by %d%% and increases its damage by 30%%.

flavor: Protector of the first counselor of Caldeum's Trade Consortium.

name: The Grand Vizier

custom.name: Meteor Damage Bonus
custom.format: Reduces the Arcane Power cost of Meteor by 50%% and increases its damage by %d%%.

flavor: Protector of the first counselor of Caldeum's Trade Consortium.

name: The Grand Vizier
flavor: Protector of the first counselor of Caldeum's Trade Consortium.

name: The Grandfather
flavor: The most ancient and revered of all greatswords.

name: Grasps of Essence

custom.name: Corpse Explosion Damage Bonus
custom.format: When an exploded corpse damages at least one enemy, your Corpse Explosion deals %d%% increased damage for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

flavor: You feel attuned to the life force in all beings.

name: The Grin Reaper

custom.format: Chance when attacking to summon horrific Mimics that cast some of your equipped skills.

flavor: Death wears many faces.

name: Griswold's Perfection
flavor: Griswold labored and studied for years to devise the perfect sword. Sadly, he died a horrible death before he himself could forge it.

name: Guard of Johanna

custom.name: Increased Blessed Hammer Damage
custom.format: Blessed Hammer damage is increased by %d%% for the first 3 enemies it hits.

flavor: "Crusader Johanna was famous for her skillful shield work in combat. When she vanished, leaving this shield behind, many speculated that she was dead. If true, her name will fall from the Crusader rolls, as she did not have an apprentice." -Abd al-Hazir.

name: Gungdo Gear

custom.name: Exploding Palm Chains
custom.format: Exploding Palm's on-death explosion applies Exploding Palm.

flavor: "Cover your wrists in righteousness that you may strike with the will of the gods." �Tenets of the Veradani

name: Gungdo Gear
flavor: "Cover your wrists in righteousness that you may strike with the will of the gods." �Tenets of the Veradani

name: Gyana Na Kashu

custom.name: Fireball Damage
custom.format: Lashing Tail Kick releases a piercing fireball that deals %d%% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 10 yards on impact.

flavor: The stone envelopes one's enemies in the warm embrace of a raging fire. The screaming drowns out their sincere thanks.

name: Gyrfalcon's Foote

custom.name: Free Blessed Shield
custom.format: Removes the resource cost of Blessed Shield.

flavor: Clearly a weapon of great renown, this flail once belonged to Sir Tomas, the Gyrfalcon. This knight was heralded for his bravery and speed, and he took the gyrfalcon as his coat of arms, soaring to victory many times beneath its wings.

name: Gyrfalcon's Foote

custom.name: Free Blessed Shield
custom.format: Removes the resource cost of Blessed Shield and increases its damage by %d%%.

flavor: Clearly a weapon of great renown, this flail once belonged to Sir Tomas, the Gyrfalcon. This knight was heralded for his bravery and speed, and he took the gyrfalcon as his coat of arms, soaring to victory many times beneath its wings.

name: Hack

custom.name: Apply Thorns on Hit
custom.format: %d%% of your Thorns damage is applied on every attack.

flavor: This crude, makeshift  axe was made from skeletal remains picked out of the Desolate Sands. Despite its primitive origins, the weapon is extremely effective, perhaps as a result of residual magics that seeped into its components since the time of area's devastation during the Mage Clan Wars.

name: Halcyon's Ascent

custom.name: Mesmerize Enemies
custom.format: When you use Vengeance, you mesmerize nearby enemies with your skill, causing them to jump uncontrollably for %d seconds.

flavor: "Raise your weapon, raise your weapon... and it's over." �Halcyon

name: Hallowed Bulwark

custom.name: Iron Skin Bonus Block Amount
custom.format: Iron Skin also increases your Block Amount by %d%%.

flavor: Forged by one of the first crusaders before he left Travincal, this shield glimmers with the light of enduring dedication. It has been passed on from master to apprentice time after time, ever guarding its bearers against the forces of darkness.

name: Halo of Arlyse

custom.name: Melee Damage Reduction
custom.format: Your Ice Armor now reduces damage from melee attacks by %d%% and automatically casts Frost Nova whenever you take 10%% of your Life in damage.

flavor: Frostsmith Arlyse labored on the glacier for many months, seeking to harness the power of deep winter. In the spring, her tribe found her frozen corpse a short distance from her camp, holding this ring up to the heavens.

name: Halo of Karini

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: You take %d%% less damage for 3 seconds after your Storm Armor electrocutes an enemy more than 30 yards away.

flavor: "See the man dance! Oh, wait, my lightning is making him do that." -Karini the Wizard.

name: Halo of Karini

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: You take %d%% less damage for 5 seconds after your Storm Armor electrocutes an enemy more than 15 yards away.

flavor: "See the man dance! Oh, wait, my lightning is making him do that." -Karini the Wizard.

name: Hammer Jammers

custom.name: Blessed Hammer Damage Bonus
custom.format: Enemies take %d%% increased damage from your Blessed Hammers for 10 seconds after you hit them with a Blind, Immobilize, or Stun.

flavor: Stop! Hammer time.

name: Hammer Jammers
flavor: These large pants cannot be touched.

name: Hand of the Prophet

custom.name: Gain Access to All Skills
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Gain access to all skills.

flavor: This ornate hamsa is said to have come from the High Heavens themselves.

name: Harrington Waistguard

custom.name: Chest Damage Bonus
custom.format: Opening a chest grants %d%% increased damage for 10 seconds.

flavor: "The thrill of successfully looting a chest makes one feel as if one may conquer any challenge. The Harrington Waistguard turns this feeling of invincibility into a reality." �Lyndon's Tales of Fortune and Glory

name: Haunt of Vaxo

custom.name: Summon Shadow Clones
custom.format: Summons shadow clones to your aid when you Stun an enemy. This effect may occur once every 30 seconds.

flavor: "The great sorcerer Vaxo of Kehjan did not actually die in the Mage Clan Wars. In reality, he was imprisoned where all mages with shattered minds are, the Bitter Depths beneath Caldeum's Yshari Sanctum. Vaxo's famous amulet is said to have been smuggled out of there, but that is patently impossible. Once inside, no one ever leaves the Bitter Depths." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Haunted Visions

custom.name: Double Simulacrum Duration
custom.format: Simulacrum now drains 5%% of your maximum life every second and lasts twice as long.

flavor: The spirits of the dead are never far. Search for them only a little, and they shall appear.

name: Haunting Girdle

custom.name: Extra Haunt Spirit
custom.format: Haunt releases 1 extra spirit.

flavor: This belt seethes with strange and disturbing magic. It upsets the fine balance between this world and the Unformed Land. To wear this is to tempt the fates.

name: Heart of Iron

custom.name: Thorns From Vitality
custom.format: Gain Thorns equal to %d%% of your Vitality.

flavor: The blessed armor of Olenna the 'Iron Crusader' eventually passed to her apprentice, who proudly wore it alongside her own. Though she took her master's name, she was ultimately known with a very different moniker. -- Abd al-Hazir, The Crusaders

name: Heart of Iron
flavor: It is said that those who wear this breastplate will display extraordinary valor in even the direst of circumstances.

name: Heart Slaughter
flavor: Your enemies will find it difficult to fight without their hearts.

name: Heart Slaughter
flavor: Your enemies will find it difficult to fight without their hearts.

name: Hellcat Waistguard

custom.name: Grenade Bounces
custom.format: Grenades have a chance to bounce %d times dealing an additional 50%% damage on each bounce. This bonus is increased to 800%% on the final bounce.

flavor: Forged in the pits of the Burning Hells using dismembered demons as raw materials.

name: Hellcat Waistguard
flavor: Forged in the pits of the Burning Hells using dismembered demons as raw materials.

name: Hellfire Amulet

custom.name: Extra Passive Skill
custom.format: Gain the %p passive.

flavor: The Hellfire Amulet is truly a badge of dedication to those who, at great cost to themselves, have sworn their lives to eradicating the demon scourge from the lands of Sanctuary.

name: Hellfire Ring

custom.name: Engulf the Ground in Lava
custom.format: Chance on hit to engulf the ground in lava, dealing 200%% weapon damage per second for 6 seconds.

flavor: Crafted of trophies ripped from vanquished foes, none can deny the bravery of a hero who wears a Hellfire Ring.

name: Hellrack

custom.name: Chance to Root Enemies
custom.format: Chance to root enemies to the ground when you hit them.

flavor: How many sinners have been pinned to the gates of Hell with this wicked device?

name: Hellskull

custom.name: Two-Handed Damage Increase
custom.format: Gain 10%% increased damage while wielding a two-handed weapon.

flavor: "One final blow severed the great demon's head, sending it rolling before Dregan's feet. He contemplated the foul thing for a moment, then took it with him to adorn his shield." �The Chronicles of Crusader Dregan

name: Helltrapper

custom.name: Chance to Summon Devices on Hit
custom.format: %d%% chance on hit to summon a Spike Trap, Caltrops or Sentry.

flavor: "This crossbow is a miracle of mechanical innovation, though its builder remains unknown. In addition to firing ordinary quarrels, the Helltrapper may also fire specialized ammunition delivering caltrops, explosive spiked mines, and even self-expanding turrets." �The Craft of War by Diadra the Scholar

name: The Helm of Rule
flavor: Worn by General Raylend while he stormed Yshrald's fortress during the War of the Hounds.

name: Henri's Perquisition

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: The first time an enemy deals damage to you, reduce that damage by %d%% and Charm the enemy for 3 seconds.

flavor: The enchanter Yanashima hired the famous craftsman Paul of Westmarch to help her create a mojo of great power. At a critical moment, Paul�s cat Henri leapt into the mix, deep in pursuit of a mouse. Now an inseparable part of the mojo, Henri is said to be eternally searching for that mouse, which has never been seen since.

name: Hergbrash's Binding

custom.name: Channeling Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the Arcane Power cost of Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, and Ray of Frost by %d%%.

flavor: �Truly understanding the depth and chaos of the untamed Arcane realm can easily lead to madness � or enlightenment. Which will you choose� or, which will choose you?� � Hergbrash the Mad
