name: Hexing Pants of Mr. Yan

custom.name: Damage Decrease While Standing Still
custom.format: Your resource generation and damage is increased by 25%% while moving and decreased by %d%% while standing still.

flavor: These pants were part of an elaborate outfit worn by the infamous (and surprisingly stylish) enchanter Mr. Yan while adventuring in Westmarch. Lacking patience, and impulse control, Mr. Yan was always rushing headlong into danger-not a recipe for survival for a spell caster. Being a clever man, though, Mr. Yan designed this garment to turn his weakness into a strength.

name: Hillenbrand's Training Sword

custom.name: Reduce Follower Cooldowns
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%%.

flavor: Hillenbrand was a Templar of surpassing dedication, who used his training sword to practice every day and night. Finally, his physical conditioning grew so vast that he could fight for forty straight hours. When lack of sleep finally drove him mad, it required ten of his brothers to fell him.

name: Holy Beacon
flavor: "Turn away from evil. Let not the foul darkness engulf the Light within you." �Akarat

name: Holy Point Shot
flavor: Crafted by the Wandering Priest of the Low Hills during an ecstatic trance, this quiver bestows a blessing on the arrows it carries.

name: Holy Point Shot

custom.name: Extra Impale Knives
custom.format: Impale throws two additional knives.

flavor: Crafted by the Wandering Priest of the Low Hills during an ecstatic trance, this quiver bestows a blessing on the arrows it carries.

name: Homing Pads

custom.name: Town Portal Damage Reduction
custom.format: Your Town Portal is no longer interrupted by taking damage. While casting Town Portal you gain a protective bubble that reduces damage taken by %d%%.

flavor: These enchanted shoulder pieces maintain a constant connection to the origin point of their wearer.

name: Homunculus

custom.name: Spawn Zombie Dogs
custom.format: A Zombie Dog is automatically summoned to your side every 2 seconds.

flavor: The severed head of a homunculus is the source of much power for a knowledgeable witch doctor.

name: Homunculus

custom.name: Zombie Dog Spawn Interval
custom.format: A Zombie Dog is automatically summoned to your side every %d seconds.

flavor: The severed head of a homunculus is the source of much power for a knowledgeable witch doctor.

name: Homunculus

custom.name: Spawn Zombie Dogs
custom.format: A Zombie Dog is automatically summoned to your side every 2 seconds.

flavor: The severed head of a homunculus is the source of much power for a knowledgeable witch doctor.

name: The Horadric Hamburger
flavor: The Horadrim wandered far and wide to gather the finest ingredients for their feast. Only the lone traveler sent to the Moo Moo farm failed to return. Diablo had laid a trap for the Horadrim, the Hell Bovine, who struck the traveler down before he could gather the final ingredient: cheese.

name: Hunter's Wrath

custom.name: Generator Damage Bonus
custom.format: Your primary skills attack 30%% faster and deal %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Your hatred knows no bounds.

name: Hwoj Wrap

custom.name: Locust Swarm Slow
custom.format: Locust Swarm also Slows enemies by %d%%.

flavor: "The witch doctor was eager to display his martial prowess, and he was especially proud of his enchanted belt, which he claimed gave him great advantage in battle. It was obviously an item of great importance to him and had been in his clan for generations untold." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Ice Climbers

custom.name: Cannot Be Frozen
custom.format: Gain immunity to Freeze and Immobilize effects.

flavor: Worn by the famous explorer Theradonn, known for his sunny disposition.

name: Illusory Boots

custom.name: Move Through Enemies
custom.format: You may move unhindered through enemies.

flavor: These soft leather boots leave no trace, even in the deep sands of the desert, and in addition, serve to muffle the footfalls of their wearer.

name: In-geom

custom.name: Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Your skill cooldowns are reduced by %d seconds for 15 seconds after killing an elite pack.

flavor: Carried by the kings of Xiansai in antiquity, this sword was said to harness the speed and lethality of four tiger spirits. One king claimed to have �exorcised� a thousand demons from their hapless victims, using only this blade.

name: Incense Torch of the Grand Temple

custom.name: Wave of Light Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the Spirit cost of Wave of Light by %d%% and increases its damage by 30%%.

flavor: Fills the air with calming fragrances as your opponent feels the weight of your displeasure.

name: Incense Torch of the Grand Temple

custom.name: Wave of Light Damage
custom.format: Reduces the Spirit cost of Wave of Light by 50%% and increases its damage by %d%%.

flavor: Fills the air with calming fragrances as your opponent feels the weight of your displeasure.

name: Insatiable Belt

custom.name: Globes Increase Health
custom.format: Picking up a Health Globe increases your maximum Life by 5%% for 15 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

flavor: You begin to feel terribly hungry. When did you last eat?

name: Inviolable Faith

custom.name: Multiple Consecration Casts
custom.format: Casting Consecration also casts Consecration beneath all of your allies.

flavor: Such a heavy, unwieldy object would ordinarily be impractical for the battlefield. However, this weapon has been blessed to slam into its targets with unusual force-wrecking doors, bodies, and even barricades�while also offering superior protection to the faithful.

name: Iron Rose

custom.name: Chance to Cast Blood Nova
custom.format: Attacking with Siphon Blood has a %d%% chance to cast a free Blood Nova.

flavor: Forged as a gift for the union between the leaders of the Haroutunian Clan and House Chien. This brooch was favored by Lady Aerisrose, and is said to reflect her power and beauty.

name: Irontoe Mudsputters

custom.name: Increased Speed on Low Life
custom.format: Gain up to %d%% increased movement speed based on amount of Life missing.

flavor: "Good, heavy steel. Nice flex around the ankle, good weight in the toes. A solid pair of boots. What, did you need them to sparkle?" �Kormac the Templar

name: Ivory Tower
flavor: This shield hums with the Song of the Arch.

name: Ivory Tower

custom.name: Fires of Heaven on Block
custom.format: Blocks release forward a Fires of Heaven.

flavor: This shield hums with the Song of the Arch.

name: Izzuccob
flavor: What fevered mind conceived of this vicious device that sends spikes hurling towards one's enemies at incredible speeds?

name: Jace's Hammer of Vigilance

custom.name: Increases Blessed Hammers Size
custom.format: Increase the size of your Blessed Hammers.

flavor: Kingsport's Wield Warriors was a group of paladins whose members were all famed for their mastery of their weapons of choice. Jace Adama was the leader of these holy warriors and a prodigy with the warhammer. As a reward for his aid in the defense of Eastgate Keep, Jace was gifted with this enchanted hammer, which displays a prominent eye motif of grave significance to the sisterhood based there.

name: Jang's Envelopment

custom.name: Black Hole Slow
custom.format: Enemies damaged by Black Hole are also slowed by %d%% for 3 seconds.

flavor: "In desperation, Irtai cast Black Hole. She was surprised when the flesh hunter's movements slowed, allowing her to deliver the killing blow, as she had forgotten she was wearing Jang's Envelopment. Irtai was lucky, but one cannot depend on luck. One must always be aware of the abilities of one's armor, and those of all the other magical items one carries." �Arch Mage Valthek

name: Jawbreaker

custom.name: Dashing Strike Reset Distance
custom.format: When Dashing Strike hits an enemy more than %d yards away, its Charge cost is refunded.

flavor: Those who speak wicked words must be silenced.

name: Jekangbord

custom.name: Extra Blessed Shield Ricochets
custom.format: Blessed Shield ricochets to %d additional enemies and has its damage increased by 200%%.

flavor: "Centuries ago, the mysterious and morbid warrior Jekang found staunch allies among the crusaders of Zakarum. He fought alongside that order for many years, and when he left for lands unknown, he made a parting gift of his grim tower shield." �Rennold's Catalogue of Arms

name: Jekangbord

custom.name: Blessed Shield Damage
custom.format: Blessed Shield ricochets to 6 additional enemies and has its damage increased by %d%%.

flavor: "Centuries ago, the mysterious and morbid warrior Jekang found staunch allies among the crusaders of Zakarum. He fought alongside that order for many years, and when he left for lands unknown, he made a parting gift of his grim tower shield." �Rennold's Catalogue of Arms

name: Jeram's Bracers

custom.name: Wall of Death Damage
custom.format: Wall of Death deals %d%% increased damage and can be cast up to three times within 2 seconds before the cooldown begins.

flavor: You can still see traces of the blood left by the demonic multitudes Jeram slew on his quest for revenge.

name: Johanna's Argument

custom.name: Blessed Hammer Bonus
custom.format: Increase the attack speed and damage of Blessed Hammer by 100%%.

flavor: One of the more mysterious tales in the annals of the Crusaders is that of Johanna. A powerful warrior, she disappeared suddenly. The fact that she did not take this, her favorite flail, seems to indicate that her journey was unplanned. She has not been seen since.

name: The Johnstone

custom.name: Corpse Skill Bonus Damage
custom.format: When Land of the Dead expires, you are granted 50 stacks of Macabre Knowledge. Macabre Knowledge increases the damage of Corpse Lance and Corpse Explosion by %d%%.

flavor: The stone in the center of the amulet glimmers with unfathomable power and potential.

name: Justice Lantern

custom.name: Block to Damage Reduction
custom.format: Gain damage reduction equal to %d%% of your Block Chance.

flavor: Once worn by the self-appointed guardians of Sanctuary, who were said to feel no fear.

name: Justice Lantern
flavor: Once worn by the self-appointed guardians of Sanctuary, who were said to feel no fear.

name: Justinian's Mercy

custom.name: Blessed Hammer Gains Dominion
custom.format: Blessed Hammer gains the effect of the Dominion rune.

flavor: Passed down among the executioners of the Justinian dynasty, this flail was lost during the chaos of the Cartolus Insurrection. Peasants stormed the palace, grabbing anything they could find, and killing the more oppressive members of the royal retinue. It didn't take them long to find the executioners.

name: K'mar Tenclip

custom.name: Strafe Gains Drifting Shadow
custom.format: Strafe gains the effect of the Drifting Shadow rune.

flavor: Featuring a unique loading mechanism and clip designed in Xiansai, this hand crossbow can unleash an entire volley of bolts before it needs to be reloaded, making it ideal for maintaining sustained fire while in motion.

name: Karlei's Point

custom.name: Impale Hatred Refund
custom.format: Impale returns %d Hatred if it hits an enemy already Impaled.

flavor: Those who argued with the Demon Hunter Karlei quickly learned that she could make her point with devastating effect.

name: Karlei's Point

custom.name: Impale Damage Increase
custom.format: The damage of Impale is increased by %d%% and it returns 15 Hatred if it hits an enemy already Impaled.

flavor: Those who argued with the Demon Hunter Karlei quickly learned that she could make her point with devastating effect.

name: Kassar's Retribution

custom.name: Increased Speed After Casting Justice
custom.format: Casting Justice increases your movement speed by %d%% for 2 seconds.

flavor: "Crusaders must be stronger than other warriors. We cannot trudge homeward after a victory, instead we return to the open road. We bend into the wind, the rain, the snow. Our search will not end until our faith is redeemed." �Kassar

name: Kekegi's Unbreakable Spirit

custom.name: Free Cast Duration
custom.format: Damaging enemies has a chance to grant you an effect that removes the Spirit cost of your abilities for %d seconds.

flavor: This stone is said to have once adorned the wise monk Kekegi�s brow. The hero�s spirit never once wavered during his legendary Five Trials, and that same indomitable will now suffuses this headgear.

name: Kethrye's Splint
flavor: "Her arrows spent and bow snapped, she advanced into a cloud of enemy spears as they fell upon her cohort, turning them aside and throwing them back in kind." �The Amazon Princess

name: Khassett's Cord of Righteousness

custom.name: Bonus FoH Damage
custom.format: Fist of the Heavens costs 40%% less Wrath and deals %d%% more damage.

flavor: "Khassett, one of the more accomplished Crusaders, was known for smithing his own armor in righteous flame believing in efficiency above all else." -Abd al-Hazir

name: Kill
flavor: "In their last moments, people show you who they really are..." �Unknown

name: Kotuur's Brace
flavor: The mighty Kotuur could easily wrestle a thorned hulk to the ground. Some say this belt was the source of his unsurpassed strength.

name: Krede's Flame

custom.name: Fire Damage Restores Resource
custom.format: Taking Fire damage restores your primary resource.

flavor: "Drink in the fire of life, great warrior." �Duke Krede

name: Kridershot

custom.name: Elemental Arrow Generates Hatred
custom.format: Elemental Arrow now generates %d Hatred.

flavor: Long ago, an outmatched hero defeated a great demon archer with a lucky shot and claimed its mighty weapon as his own. It was to be the last good fortune he enjoyed, as the dying demon's curse wormed its way into the bow. For the remainder of his short life, the hero never knew a day free from conflict. Strife and destruction have dogged every poor soul to bear the bow.

name: Krysbin's Sentence

custom.name: Damage Against Impaired Enemies
custom.format: You deal %d%% increased damage against slowed enemies or triple this bonus against enemies afflicted by any other type of control-impairing effect.

flavor: "How curious. The day we cross paths is also the day of your passing."�Necromancer Krysbin

name: Kymbo's Gold

custom.name: Gold Heals
custom.format: Picking up gold heals you for an amount equal to the gold that was picked up.

flavor: The great merchant Abd al-Kymbo commissioned this amulet, believing that health and wealth should be synonymous. Alas, he did not realize how much time he would spend on his knees picking up single coins, and soon abandoned the practice.

name: Kyoshiro's Blade

custom.name: Wave of Light Damage Bonus
custom.format: Increase the damage of Wave of Light by 150%%. When the initial impact of your Wave of Light hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: Kyoshiro was an optimist going into the battle at Xiansai. Though the walls were tumbling down around him, he quickly disposed of his enemies.

name: Kyoshiro's Soul

custom.name: Sweeping Wind Gains Stacks
custom.format: Sweeping Wind gains 2 stacks every second it does not deal damage to any enemies.

flavor: Kyoshiro felt a great calm come over him after the battle at Xiansai. He closed his eyes and it felt like nothing changed at all.

name: Lacuni Prowlers
flavor: The savage fierceness of the lacuni is unrivaled in all of Sanctuary.

name: Lai Yui's Persuader
flavor: "Remember what you learned here today," she told the defeated band of thieves, "or I will return to remind you."

name: Lakumba's Ornament

custom.name: Soul Harvest Damage Reduction
custom.format: Reduce all damage taken by 6%% for each stack of Soul Harvest you have.

flavor: There is a thread from the Unformed Land in all things. Lakumba, above all others, knew how to weave it. Her shrouds revealed a truth many refused to see.

name: Lamentation

custom.name: Rend Stacks Twice
custom.format: Rend can now stack up to 2 times on an enemy.

flavor: Ideal for crushing your enemies and driving them before you.

name: Lamentation
flavor: Ideal for crushing your enemies and driving them before you.

name: Last Breath

custom.name: Mass Confusion Cooldown
custom.format: Reduces cooldown of Mass Confusion by %d seconds.

flavor: Even an immortal could be felled by the power of this blade.

name: Last Breath
flavor: Even an immortal could be felled by the power of this blade.

name: The Laws of Seph

custom.name: Blinding Flash Spirit Recovery
custom.format: Using Blinding Flash restores %d Spirit.

flavor: Seph the Patriarch, for whom this stone was named, was famed for illuminating concepts in a way that led to epiphanies in his students. In much the same way, this spirit stone casts the glorious light generated by its wearer deep inside the monk�s soul as well as outward to blind enemies.

name: Lefebvre's Soliloquy

custom.name: Cyclone Strike Damage Reduction
custom.format: Cyclone Strike reduces your damage taken by %d%% for 5 seconds.

flavor: The monk Lefebvre was famous for delivering soliloquies in battle. If they were eloquent, no one knows, for all who heard them died.

name: Leger's Disdain

custom.name: Grim Scythe Damage per Essence
custom.format: Grim Scythe deals an additional %d%% damage for each point of essence it restores.

flavor: The face within the center of the cross is the shrunken visage of an ancient priest of Rathma. He appears to be judging you unfavorably.

name: Leger's Disdain

custom.name: Grim Scythe Damage per Essence
custom.format: Grim Scythe deals an additional %d%% damage for each point of essence it restores.

flavor: The face within the center of the cross is the shrunken visage of an ancient priest of Rathma. He appears to be judging you unfavorably.

name: Leonine Bow of Hashir

custom.name: Chance to Pull Enemies
custom.format: Bolas have a %d%% chance on explosion to pull in all enemies within 24 yards.

flavor: Hashir was a gifted blacksmith who often spoke passionately about the need for mankind to live in peace and harmony with all things. Until his family was killed. Then he turned his talents towards creating the most effective ways to inflict massive amounts of pain and suffering on those responsible.

name: Leoric's Crown

custom.name: Increased Gem Effects
custom.format: Increase the effect of any gem socketed into your helm by %d%%. This effect does not apply to Legendary Gems.
custom.altformat: Increase the effect of any gem socketed into this item by %d%%.

flavor: The crown of the Black King. The taint of his madness wafts from the metal, clinging to any jewel that comes near it.

name: Leoric's Crown
flavor: The crown of the Black King.

name: Leoric's Signet
flavor: King Leoric had hoped to pass along the symbol of his family's noble lineage to his first son before they met an unfortunate fate.

name: Lianna's Wings

custom.name: Smoke Screen on Shadow Power
custom.format: Shadow Power also triggers Smoke Screen.

flavor: This bow, upon which the angel Lianna bestowed her wings, fell from the heavens and grants the wielder great power, but at a cost.

name: Lidless Wall
flavor: Created by the followers of Rathma, favored by practitioners of magic.

name: Light of Grace

custom.name: Ray of Frost now pierces
custom.format: Ray of Frost now pierces.

flavor: "The guttering flame within this ornate Xiansai brazier burns with a cold, dim light. In fact, the Light of Grace actually draws warmth from its surroundings to increase its dull luminance, a rather simple magical effect that some sly wizard might well coopt to increase her powers." �Isendra the Sorceress

name: Lion's Claw

custom.name: Extra Seven-Sided Strike Attacks
custom.format: Seven-Sided Strike performs an additional 7 strikes.

flavor: The ferocity of Uliana�s unrelenting attacks was often compared to that of a lion.

name: Living Umbral Oath
flavor: The Umbral Oath exists in both the living and spirit worlds.

name: Logan's Claw
flavor: Bearing this weapon can release the feral beast within.

name: Lord Greenstone's Fan

custom.name: Fan of Knives Damage Bonus
custom.format: Every second, gain %d%% increased damage for your next Fan of Knives. Stacks up to 30 times.

flavor: Legend has it that on hot days, Lord Greenstone enjoyed cooling himself with the wind of hurled knives.

name: Lord Greenstone's Fan

custom.name: Fan of Knives Damage Bonus
custom.format: Every second, gain %d%% increased damage for your next Fan of Knives. Stacks up to 30 times.

flavor: Legend has it that on hot days, Lord Greenstone enjoyed cooling himself with the wind of hurled knives.

name: Lord Greenstone's Fan

custom.name: Fan of Knives Damage Bonus
custom.format: Every second, gain %d%% increased damage for your next Fan of Knives. Stacks up to 30 times.

flavor: Legend has it that on hot days, Lord Greenstone enjoyed cooling himself with the wind of hurled knives.

name: Lornelle's Sunstone

custom.name: Damage Reduction per Missing Life
custom.format: Your damage reduction is increased by %.2f%% for every 1%% Life you are missing.

flavor: Forged to protect a loved one, this ring gleams with its own perfect light.

name: Lost Time

custom.name: Cold Skill Movement Speed
custom.format: Your cold skills reduce the movement speed of enemies by 30%%. In addition, your movement speed is increased by %d%% for 5 seconds.  Maximum 5 stacks.

flavor: The hourglass glows with the essence of several lives that ended too soon.

name: Lost Time

custom.name: Cold Skill Movement Speed
custom.format: Your cold skills reduce the movement speed of enemies by 30%%. In addition, your movement speed is increased by %d%% for 5 seconds. Maximum 5 stacks.

flavor: The hourglass glows with the essence of several lives that ended too soon.

name: Lut Socks

custom.name: Leap can be cast multiple times
custom.format: Leap can be cast up to three times within 2 seconds before the cooldown begins.

flavor: Southal of Lut Bahadur crafted these boots in order to reach high, open windows to make his thieving easier. He was last seen disappearing into the night in the claws of a large carrion bat.

name: Mad Monarch's Scepter

custom.name: Poison Nova Damage
custom.format: After killing 10 enemies, you release a Poison Nova that deals %d%% weapon damage as Poison to enemies within 30 yards.

flavor: This item of royal regalia is as much mace as scepter, and at the height of his madness, King Leoric was known to evince his displeasure by pummeling courtiers, servants, and even foreign dignitaries with the weighty rod.

name: Madawc's Sorrow

custom.name: Stun on First Hit
custom.format: Stun enemies for 2 seconds the first time you hit them.

flavor: The storm of demonic destruction that thundered toward the gates of Harrogath was held back for what seemed like ages by a lone barbarian wielding this immense weapon. But even the mightiest of warriors will tire and eventually fall, and such was the case with this nameless hero. Madawc's Sorrow was thought lost in the destruction of the sacred mountain, but has recently resurfaced intact.

name: Madstone

custom.name: Auto Exploding Palm
custom.format: Your Seven-Sided Strike applies Exploding Palm.

flavor: The monk Vhalit is said to have been driven mad with the power of this stone. Can you withstand the corruption that lies within?

name: Magefist

custom.name: Fire Damage
custom.format: Fire skills deal %d%% increased damage.

flavor: You hold the power of true magic within your hands.

name: Magefist
flavor: You hold the power of true magic within your hands.

name: The Magistrate

custom.name: Hydra Casts Frost Nova
custom.format: Frost Hydra now periodically casts Frost Nova.

flavor: The most powerful of wizards will find themselves richly rewarded by their studies. This hat is for those who like to display their power in a more elegant fashion.

name: Maloth's Focus

custom.name: Enemies Occasionally Flee
custom.format: Enemies occasionally flee at the sight of this staff.

flavor: Used as a focal point for Maloth's fearsome power. It took an army to pry it from his hands.

name: Maltorius' Petrified Spike

custom.name: Bone Spear Damage Bonus
custom.format: Bone Spear now costs 40 Essence and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: In an unparalleled display of summoning prowess, Master Necromancer Maltorius raised the tallest golem in history--until this spike was cut from it.

name: Maltorius' Petrified Spike

custom.name: Bone Spear Damage Bonus
custom.format: Bone Spear now costs 40 Essence and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: In an unparalleled display of summoning prowess, Master Necromancer Maltorius raised the tallest golem in history--until this spike was cut from it.

name: Manald Heal
flavor: Crafted by the healers of Viz-jun to protect their warriors from harm.

name: Manald Heal

custom.name: Damage on Paralysis
custom.format: Enemies stunned with Paralysis also take %d%% weapon damage as Lightning.

flavor: Crafted by the healers of Viz-jun to protect their warriors from harm.

name: Manticore
flavor: The flying quills of the manticore's tail are filled with lethal toxin.

name: Manticore

custom.name: Cluster Arrow Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the Hatred cost of Cluster Arrow by %d%% and increases its damage by 80%%.

flavor: The flying quills of the manticore's tail are filled with lethal toxin.

name: Manticore

custom.name: Cluster Arrow Damage Bonus
custom.format: Reduces the Hatred cost of Cluster Arrow by 50%% and increases its damage by %d%%.

flavor: The flying quills of the manticore's tail are filled with lethal toxin.

name: Mantle of Channeling

custom.name: Bonus Damage While Channeling
custom.format: While channeling Whirlwind, Rapid Fire, Strafe, Tempest Rush, Firebats, Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, you deal %d%% increased damage and take 25%% reduced damage.

flavor: Drawing power from the ether is a tricky thing. Even the most dedicated practitioner is not able to effectively contain all of it for their use. This armor redirects that excess energy to serve its wearer.

name: Mantle of the Rydraelm
flavor: The Rydraelm, a shadowy group of mages, concerned itself with the most arcane forms of magic until its mysterious and grisly demise.

name: Mara's Kaleidoscope

custom.name: Poison Absorb
custom.format: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for %d%% of the amount prevented.

flavor: Spoken of in hushed tones in the halls of the Yshari Sanctum, the kaleidoscope is one of the most coveted magical items in existence.

name: Mark of the Magi
flavor: It is believed the magi, practitioners of strange and esoteric magics, died out long ago. The only proofs of their existence are the Behistun tomes and this staff.

name: Mask of Jeram

custom.name: Pet Damage
custom.format: Pets deal %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Long ago, a powerful witch doctor named Jeram waged a one-man war on the khazra after they slew his family. To pursue his vendetta, Jeram crafted this terrible mask, capable of calling all manner of beasts and the walking dead to his service. Those who came across the ruined khazra villages�with their dead half devoured, swollen with venom, and scorched by fire�knew it could only be Jeram's work.

name: Mask of Jeram

custom.name: Pet Damage
custom.format: Pets deal %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Long ago, a powerful witch doctor named Jeram waged a one-man war on the khazra after they slew his family. To pursue his vendetta, Jeram crafted this terrible mask, capable of calling all manner of beasts and the walking dead to his service. Those who came across the ruined khazra villages�with their dead half devoured, swollen with venom, and scorched by fire�knew it could only be Jeram's work.

name: Mask of Scarlet Death

custom.name: Revive Damage per Corpse
custom.format: Revive now consumes all corpses to raise a minion that deals %d%% more damage per corpse.

flavor: It grins at you unsettlingly.

name: Maximus

custom.name: Chance to Summon Demonic Slave
custom.format: Chance on hit to summon a Demonic Slave.

flavor: The famed warrior Maximus defeated ninety nine demons singlehandedly in the Battle of Lut Bahadur, and imbued his sword with their demonic power.

name: Mempo of Twilight
flavor: The helmet of the last of the honor-bound warriors. He roamed the far east long ago and lived and died by his code of honor.

name: Messerschmidt's Reaver
flavor: This mighty weapon once hewed its way through the demon-infested catacombs beneath the old Zakarum cathedral in Tristram. Could it be the weapon the warrior Aidan used to defeat Diablo all those years ago?

name: Meticulous Bolts

custom.name: Ball Lightning Speed
custom.format: Elemental Arrow - Ball Lightning now travels at %d%% speed.

flavor: �We must take time to enjoy the good things in life. The death throes of demons, for instance.� -Bytor the Hunter

name: The Mind's Eye

custom.name: Spirit Regeneration in Inner Sanctuary
custom.format: Inner Sanctuary increases Spirit Regeneration per second by %d.

flavor: Only one who opens the tenth gate can cleanse her soul.

name: Mirrorball

custom.name: Extra Magic Missiles
custom.format: Magic Missile fires %d extra missiles.

flavor: "Summoned from beyond the veil of death, and disposed to send its victims back there, the malevolent intelligence within this silver sphere may only be controlled by someone with intense resolve. Once its power is harnessed, however, the ball acts as a loyal enforcer of its master's will." �Deckard Cain

name: Monster Hunter
flavor: Be wary when you fight monsters, lest you become one.

name: Moonlight Ward

custom.name: Arcane Explosion Damage
custom.format: Hitting an enemy within 15 yards has a chance to ward you with shards of Arcane energy that explode when enemies get close, dealing %d%% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 15 yards.

flavor: "The moonlight shrouds the warrior who walks with the spirits." �Darweshi, Knower of the Clan of the Seven Stones

name: Mordullu's Promise

custom.name: Firebomb Mana Generation
custom.format: Firebomb generates %d Mana.

flavor: "When I move to the unformed land, you may throw my skull at the unwise, and I will return long enough to invigorate you." -Mordullu's promise to his heirs.

name: Moribund Gauntlets

custom.name: Golem Sheds Corpses
custom.format: Your Golem sheds a corpse every second.

flavor: Death is the state that unites all things. That which seems alive is only waiting to die.

name: The Mortal Drama

custom.name: Double Bombardment Impacts
custom.format: Double the number of Bombardment impacts.

flavor: "A tragedy is merely a comedy where the audience understands the consequences." �Samuel Drest, playwright

name: Myken's Ball of Hate

custom.name: Electrocute Can Chain Back
custom.format: Electrocute can chain to enemies that have already been hit.

flavor: Myken, famed sorcerer of the island nation of Uie, was known for his vitriolic demeanor. One day, at the height of a fevered tirade, the magical embodiment of his wrath burst from his body, granting the spellcaster a serenity that he'd missed for years. Many have since sought the orb, hoping to master its terrible destructive force.

name: Nagelring

custom.name: Summon Fallen Lunatic
custom.format: Summons a Fallen Lunatic to your side every %d seconds.

flavor: Crafted by a mad sorcerer during his long imprisonment within the bitter labyrinths of the Black Obelisk of Vyr.

name: Nagelring
flavor: Crafted by a mad sorcerer during his long imprisonment within the bitter labyrinths of the Black Obelisk of Vyr.

name: Nailbiter
flavor: Simple, but effective.

name: Nayr's Black Death

custom.name: Poison Skill Damage per Stack
custom.format: Each different poison skill you use increases the damage of your poison skills by %d%% for 15 seconds.

flavor: A weapon of mysterious origins that seems to cut more deeply when you're cutting it a little close in battle.

name: Nayr's Black Death

custom.name: Poison Skill Damage per Stack
custom.format: Each different poison skill you use increases the damage of your poison skills by %d%% for 15 seconds.

flavor: A weapon of mysterious origins that seems to cut more deeply when you're cutting it a little close in battle.

name: Neanderthal
flavor: It's big. It's heavy. It's wood.

name: Nemesis Bracers

custom.name: Shrines Spawn Champions
custom.format: Shrines will spawn an enemy champion.

flavor: Wear these armguards at your own risk. Only for the heartiest of adventurers.

name: Night's Reaping
flavor: The righteous must cull the corrupt from this world just as a farmer would separate the wheat from the chaff.

name: Nilfur's Boast

custom.name: Meteor Damage Bonus
custom.format: Increase the damage of Meteor by 200%%. When your Meteor hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: The Horadrim Nilfur was so accurate in her spellcasting that she could call meteors to land at her feet.

name: Nilfur's Boast

custom.name: Meteor Damage Bonus
custom.format: Increase the damage of Meteor by 100%%. When your Meteor hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: The Horadrim Nilfur was so accurate in her spellcasting that she could call meteors to land at her feet.

name: Nilfur's Boast

custom.name: Meteor Damage Bonus
custom.format: Increase the damage of Meteor by 600%%. When your Meteor hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: The Horadrim Nilfur was so accurate in her spellcasting that she could call meteors to land at her feet.

name: The Ninth Cirri Satchel

custom.name: Hungering Arrow Pierces
custom.format: Hungering Arrow has %d%% additional chance to pierce.

flavor: "This satchel is cleverly designed so that the heads of arrows placed within fit into slots that serve as whetstones, sharpening the edges whenever an arrow is inserted or removed. Cirri's artistry remained unrecognized in his lifetime, so that only this quiver, numbered nine on the interior, survived to the present." �The Craft of War by Diadra the Scholar

name: Nutcracker
flavor: Each strike lands with enough force to crush a boulder.

name: Oathkeeper

custom.name: Primary Skill Damage Bonus
custom.format: Your primary skills attack 50%% faster and deal %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Betrayed by his kin, robbed of his birthright, Andar Kul-Vagas spent more than a year in isolation forging this blade. The Tribe of Thunder records that he returned to reclaim his clan, and before they died, his traitorous brothers did finally uphold their broken oaths.

name: Obsidian Ring of the Zodiac
flavor: Many an adventurer met his doom searching for this fabled ring in the catacombs beneath the Zakarum cathedral in Tristram.

name: Obsidian Ring of the Zodiac

custom.name: Cooldown Reduction
custom.format: Reduce the remaining cooldown of one of your skills by 1 seconds when you hit with a resource-spending attack.

flavor: Many an adventurer met his doom searching for this fabled ring in the catacombs beneath the Zakarum cathedral in Tristram.

name: The Oculus

custom.name: Chance to Reset Teleport Cooldown
custom.format: Taking damage has up to a %d%% chance to reset the cooldown on Teleport.

flavor: This orb was purported to be the eye of a giant, magical sea creature, but it was actually painstakingly crafted, layer upon layer, by the grand mage Ethad five hundred years before the time of the Horadrim.

name: Oculus Ring

custom.name: Damage Bonus
custom.format: Chance to create an area of focused power on killing a monster. Damage is increased by %d%% while standing in the area.

flavor: The eye of the one god blesses those who seek it out.

name: Oculus Ring
flavor: The eye of the one god blesses those who seek it out.

name: Oculus Ring

custom.name: Damage Bonus
custom.format: Chance to create an area of focused power on killing a monster. Damage is increased by %d%% while standing in the area.

flavor: The eye of the one god blesses those who seek it out.

name: Odyn Son

custom.name: Chance to Cast Chain Lightning
custom.format: %d%% chance to Chain Lightning enemies when you hit them.

flavor: This hammer rumbles with the sound of distant thunder.

name: Odyssey's End

custom.name: Snared Damage Bonus
custom.format: Enemies snared by your Entangling Shot take %d%% increased damage from all sources.

flavor: After her many travels, the heroine Aphaena returned home bearing the mightiest bow in all of Skovos. Only the strongest warriors may string it, and in modern times, the greatest of Skovos's champions compete for that honor.

name: Omnislash

custom.name: Omnislash
custom.format: Slash attacks in all directions.

flavor: A gift from the Patriarch Seph to Inhora, a crusader who came to the aid of Ivgorod at a crucial time.

name: Omryn's Chain

custom.name: Vault Drops Caltrops
custom.format: Drop Caltrops when using Vault.

flavor: �I bought this from an ancient conjurer named Omryn. I believe it traps your enemies while you escape or something? To be honest, I just thought it made me look dangerous. No, the other demon hunters won�t talk to me, why do you ask?�-Darnal of the Wastes

name: Orb of Infinite Depth

custom.name: Damage Bonus
custom.format: Each time you hit an enemy with Explosive Blast your damage is increased by %d%% and your damage reduction is increased by 20%% for 6 seconds. This effect can stack up to 4 times.

flavor: �There were three - Borax the barbarian, Patel the wizard, and Zatheria the demon hunter. They drew on their unwavering bond to each other to keep from falling to the twisted lord and his minions. Tired, cornered, and near death, they readied themselves for their final assault.� - Chronicles of the North

name: Orb of Infinite Depth

custom.name: Damage Bonus
custom.format: Each time you hit an enemy with Explosive Blast your damage is increased by %d%% and your damage reduction is increased by 15%% for 6 seconds. This effect can stack up to 4 times.

flavor: �There were three - Borax the barbarian, Patel the wizard, and Zatheria the demon hunter. They drew on their unwavering bond to each other to keep from falling to the twisted lord and his minions. Tired, cornered, and near death, they readied themselves for their final assault.� - Chronicles of the North

name: Ouroboros
flavor: "All energy flows from and returns to the eternal source." �Archmage Kang

name: Overwhelming Desire

custom.name: Chance to Charm Enemies
custom.format: Chance on hit to charm the enemy. While charmed, the enemy takes 35%% increased damage.

flavor: Enticing dreams flicker in and out of the surface of this serpentine pendant.

name: The Paddle

custom.name: Slap!
custom.format: Slap!

flavor: The currents of a battle must be navigated with a strong hand.

name: Pandemonium Loop

custom.name: Feared Enemies Explode
custom.format: Enemies slain while Feared die in a bloody explosion and cause other nearby enemies to flee in Fear.

flavor: "Wishing to sow fear among the angelic defenders of the Pandemonium Fortress, Diablo gifted this ring to Iskatu, who used it to great effect in his battles against the Host. Its power could not sway Imperius, however, and the ring was lost along with Iskatu's arm before the demon could flee the field of battle." �Deckard Cain

name: Pauldrons of the Skeleton King

custom.name: Chance to Revive
custom.format: When receiving fatal damage, there is a chance that you are instead restored to 25%% of maximum Life and cause nearby enemies to flee in fear.

flavor: "No matter its value, it would be wise to let the raiment of the Black King remain buried with its fallen owner. No good can come of disturbing Leoric's rest." �Deckard Cain

name: Penders Purchase
flavor: Only the wisest adventurer is fit to don these powerful gauntlets.

name: Pig Sticker

custom.name: Squeal!
custom.format: Squeal!

flavor: Slaughters man and beast alike.

name: Pinto's Pride

custom.name: Wave of Light Damage Bonus
custom.format: Wave of Light also Slows enemies by 80%% for 3 seconds and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: A group of monks on a mission from the Patriarchs entered a small village in the west. Here they met a smith named Pinto, and were much impressed by his mighty beard. Touched at their admiration, Pinto agreed to create a pair of bracers that would enhance their powers.

name: Piro Marella

custom.name: Shield Bash Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the Wrath cost of Shield Bash by %d%%.

flavor: "I have shaped too much steel for the purpose of killing. I offer these shields in the hope that you will bring safety and mercy back to our world." �Mastersmith Oskar Iach on presenting the Alma Negra and the Piro Marella to Akkhan

name: Pledge of Caldeum
flavor: Long a symbol of an open and free society, this weapon has come to represent the tyranny and corruption that have befallen the great city.

name: Pox Faulds

custom.name: Poison Cloud Damage
custom.format: When 3 or more enemies are within 12 yards, you release a vile stench that deals %d%% weapon damage as Poison every second for 5 seconds to enemies within 15 yards.

flavor: Made from the treated skin of plague victims.

name: Pox Faulds

custom.name: Poison Cloud Damage
custom.format: When 3 or more enemies are within 12 yards, you release a vile stench that deals %d%% weapon damage as Poison every second for 10 seconds to enemies within 15 yards.

flavor: Made from the treated skin of plague victims.

name: Pride of Cassius

custom.name: Increased Ignore Pain Duration
custom.format: Increases the duration of Ignore Pain by %d seconds.

flavor: He moved swiftly and he struck hard. Truly the greatest warrior to have walked the land.

name: Pride's Fall

custom.name: Reduces Resource Costs
custom.format: Your resource costs are reduced by 30%% after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

flavor: Fit for royalty, this helm enhances whoever wears it, while quietly diminishing everyone else. Ideal for large gatherings.

name: Primordial Soul

custom.name: Elemental Exposure Upgrade
custom.format: Elemental Exposure's damage bonus per stack is increased to 10%%.

flavor: The Primordial Soul has existed since before time began. It is the perfect expression of the original elements of creation.

name: Profane Pauldrons
flavor: The mouths of the demonic visages that adorn these pauldrons devour health globes, digesting them in order to provide additional benefits to their wearer. Unfortunately, those selfsame mouths often whisper vile suggestions when others cannot hear.

name: Promise of Glory

custom.name: Chance to Spawn Nephalem Globe
custom.format: %d%% chance to spawn a Nephalem Glory globe when you Blind an enemy.

flavor: Lost and found again through the ages, these bracers bear the names of all who have worn them. Each one found great glory, but not all survived to reap the rewards.

name: Pus Spitter

custom.name: Chance to Lob an Acid Blob
custom.format: %d%% chance to lob an acid blob when attacking.

flavor: Imbued with the magic of the Torajan jungles. But from where does it get its ammunition?

name: Puzzle Ring

custom.name: Goblin Item Drop Rate
custom.format: Summon a treasure goblin who picks up normal-quality items for you. After picking up %d items, he drops a rare item with a chance for a legendary.

flavor: Clearly the product of an ingenious and befuddling mind, this ring has interlocking pieces that rotate and shift to reveal strange glowing patterns. Every configuration reveals a different magical property.

name: Quetzalcoatl

custom.name: Double D.o.t. Speed
custom.format: Locust Swarm and Haunt now deal their damage in half of the normal duration.

flavor: The Oaxazi tribe sends promising children into the deep jungle to be judged by the great feathered serpent. Those who return are trained in the sacred arts.

name: Rabid Strike

custom.name: Epiphany Teleport Echoes Spenders
custom.format: Spirit spenders that teleport you while Epiphany is active are also mimicked on a nearby target for free.

flavor: Those who survive the winter fever retain the strength of the madness it brings.

name: Rabid Strike
flavor: Those who survive the winter fever retain the strength of the madness it brings.

name: Rakoff's Glass of Life

custom.name: Extra Health Globes
custom.format: Enemies you kill have a %d%% additional chance to drop a health globe.

flavor: Rakoff was a simple layman scribe who studied the ways and fighting technique of the monks extensively before creating an item to draw out the life force of a defeated enemy.

name: Ranslor's Folly

custom.name: Energy Twister Vortex
custom.format: Energy Twister Periodically pulls in lesser enemies within 30 yards.

flavor: Ranslor, the chief crafter to the High Vizjerei, was concerned that the power contained within these bracers would prove too much for even the most seasoned warrior, so he scoured waterfront taverns for unfortunate souls to test them. After several catastrophic failures, he was so certain he had solved the problem he tried them himself. The bracers were found by his assistant in a pile of ash.

name: Ranslor's Folly

custom.name: Energy Twister Vortex
custom.format: The damage of Energy Twister is increased by %d%% and it periodically pulls in lesser enemies within 30 yards.

flavor: Ranslor, the chief crafter to the High Vizjerei, was concerned that the power contained within these bracers would prove too much for even the most seasoned warrior, so he scoured waterfront taverns for unfortunate souls to test them. After several catastrophic failures, he was so certain he had solved the problem he tried them himself. The bracers were found by his assistant in a pile of ash.

name: The Raven's Wing

custom.name: A raven flies to your side
custom.format: A raven flies to your side.

flavor: Legends say that ravens serve as Death's couriers, carrying souls to the afterlife. Blood Raven carried this bow in the tradition of that sacred duty until she fell to the forces of corruption.

name: Razeth's Volition

custom.name: Skeletal Mage Gains Gift of Death
custom.format: Skeletal Mage gains the effect of the Gift of Death rune.

flavor: If one did not fear Razeth, one feared the dark powers of his minions.

name: Razor Strop

custom.name: Health Globe Explosion Damage
custom.format: Picking up a Health Globe releases an explosion that deals %d%% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 20 yards.

flavor: Encompassing both form and function, this belt keeps your pants up and your blades sharp.

name: Reaper's Wraps

custom.name: Health Globes Resource Recovery
custom.format: Health globes restore %d%% of your primary resource.

flavor: "The magic emanating from these bracers is strange and unknown to us. Prior to their discovery, it was thought impossible to utilize the powers that grant one health to also regenerate one's might. Their very existence forces us to reconsider some of our basic understandings of the nature of magic." �Archmage Valthek

name: Rechel's Ring of Larceny

custom.name: Increased Speed on Fear
custom.format: Gain %d%% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after Fearing an enemy.

flavor: Rechel, a prominent member of Kingsport's Thieves Guild, may not have been the stealthiest cutpurse, but thanks in part to this ring, she was never caught by the authorities.

name: Reilena's Shadowhook

custom.name: Bone Spikes Essence per Enemy
custom.format: Every point of Maximum Essence increases your damage by 0.5%% and Bone Spikes generates %d additional Essence for each enemy hit.

flavor: The swiftest of the Priests of Rathma, Reilena could weave her way through enemies with the grace of a dancer, leaving only bones in her wake.

name: Relic of Akarat

custom.name: Gain Access to All Skills
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Gain access to all skills.

flavor: This fingerbone is reputed to be that of none other than the founder of the Zakarum faith.

name: Remorseless

custom.name: Chance to Summon Ancient
custom.format: Hammer of the Ancients has a %d%% chance to summon an Ancient for 20 seconds.

flavor: Murkolt, a giant even among the Ancients, was known for many feats and qualities. Remorse was not among these. This weapon is said to embody his ethos, and some even believe it can summon him for a brief time.

name: Requiem Cereplate

custom.name: Devour Restoration Over Time
custom.format: Devour restores an additional %d%% Essence and Life. In addition, when Devour restores Essence or Life above your maximum, the excess is granted over 3 seconds.

flavor: Originally fashioned for a king's burial, it was instead entrusted to a Priest of Rathma, who began the tradition of passing it on to the worthiest champions of the necropolis.

name: Rhen'ho Flayer

custom.name: Plague of Toads Tracks Enemies
custom.format: Plague of Toads now seek out enemies and can explode twice.

flavor: "Many said training exploding toads was impossible, but Rhen'ho only laughed. He then proceeded to teach the toads how to explode twice, for he truly believed that one needs only to see the impossible clearly in one's mind to make it real." �Minacal of the Tribe of the Hidden Valley

name: Ribald Etchings

custom.name: Gain Access to All Skills
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Gain access to all skills.

flavor: These risqu� drawings quite graphically depict numerous lewd acts frowned upon by polite society.

name: Rimeheart

custom.name: Chance to Deal a Lot of Damage
custom.format: 20%% chance on hit to instantly deal 10000%% weapon damage as Cold to enemies that are Frozen.

flavor: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. Made during Peerse's Low Period, which followed the loss of his family, Rimeheart, with the blistering chill it radiates and its cold-forged iron blade, reflects both the hardening of its creator in the wake of tragedy and his consummate skill.

name: Ring of Emptiness

custom.name: Bonus Damage on Afflicted Targets
custom.format: You deal %d%% increased damage to enemies affected by both your Haunt and Locust Swarm.

flavor: The warriors of the Teganze believe that every being senses the Unformed Land waiting for them, whether they realize it or not. This band can disrupt that connection, resulting in an emptiness that rivals even the most excruciating physical pain.

name: Ring of Emptiness

custom.name: Bonus Damage on Afflicted Targets
custom.format: You deal %d%% increased damage to enemies affected by both your Haunt and Locust Swarm.

flavor: The warriors of the Teganze believe that every being senses the Unformed Land waiting for them, whether they realize it or not. This band can disrupt that connection, resulting in an emptiness that rivals even the most excruciating physical pain.

name: Ring of Royal Grandeur

custom.name: Set Requirements Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the number of items needed for set bonuses by 1 (to a minimum of 2).

flavor: "Contemporary accounts say the Mad King's ring was a wonder to behold, its many jewels glinting like stars in the firmament." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Rivera Dancers

custom.name: Lashing Tail Kick Damage
custom.format: Lashing Tail Kick attacks 50%% faster and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: Everyone wishes they were as cool as the person wearing these boots.

name: Rogar's Huge Stone

custom.name: Increased Regeneration at Low Life
custom.format: Increase your Life per Second by up to %d%% based on your missing Life.

flavor: The history of the large azure gem set in this ring is unknown. Some scholars surmise it was crafted by the ancient nephalem using techniques now lost, while others believe it was fashioned from the crystallized blood of Anu himself. Regardless of its origin, the gem acts as a lodestone for arcane power, drawing it in, and then focuses it through its facets to heal the ring's wearer.

name: Rondal's Locket
flavor: "To Rondal�When you carry this, you carry my heart. Love always, Marta."

name: Rozpedin's Force
flavor: Rozpedin purified himself through meditation for thirty days before crafting this staff out of a single piece of white oak.

name: Sacred Harness

custom.name: Falling Sword Casts Judgment
custom.format: Judgment gains the effect of the Debilitate rune and is cast at your landing location when casting Falling Sword.

flavor: �Fall upon your enemies like divine retribution from above.� -Elder Crusader Drakon

name: Sacred Harvester

custom.name: Extra Soul Harvest Stacks
custom.format: Soul Harvest now stacks up to 10 times.

flavor: �To expand one�s mind with the breath of others is not a thing to be taken lightly. Without the proper training or discipline it soon leads to madness.� -Elder Bayati, Tribe of the Five Hills

name: Saffron Wrap
flavor: Bound according to the precepts of Anrach.

name: Saffron Wrap

custom.name: Overpower Damage Bonus
custom.format: The damage of your next Overpower is increased by %d%% for each enemy hit. Max 20 enemies.

flavor: Bound according to the precepts of Anrach.

name: Salvation

custom.name: Heal on Block
custom.format: Blocked attacks heal you and your allies for %d%% of the amount blocked.

flavor: "Do not hesitate to strike down your enemies. Death is their salvation from evil." �Crusader proverb

name: Sanguinary Vambraces

custom.name: Chance to Deal Thorns Damage
custom.format: Chance on being hit to deal 1000%% of your Thorns damage to nearby enemies.

flavor: These wickedly serrated forearm guards remain caked with the dried blood of the Black King's innocent victims.

custom.name: Dagger Damage
custom.format: 25%% chance on attack to throw a dagger at a nearby enemy for %d%% weapon damage as Physical.

name: Sash of Knives

custom.name: Dagger Damage
custom.format: With every attack, you throw a dagger at a nearby enemy for %d%% weapon damage as Physical.

flavor: �Keep your friends close, and your enemies within dagger throwing range.� Vis-Jaq�taar saying.

name: Scarbringer
flavor: Each scar left in its wake is a sin forgiven.

name: Scarbringer

custom.name: Lashing Tail Kick Damage
custom.format: The damage of Lashing Tail Kick is increased by %d%% to the first 7 enemies hit.

flavor: Each scar left in its wake is a sin forgiven.

name: Scarbringer

custom.name: Bonus Target Count
custom.format: The damage of Lashing Tail Kick is increased by 300%% to the first %d enemies hit.

flavor: Each scar left in its wake is a sin forgiven.

name: Schaefer's Hammer

custom.name: Lightning Charge Damage
custom.format: Getting hit has a chance to charge you with Lightning, causing you to deal %d%% weapon damage as Lightning every second for 5 seconds to nearby enemies.

flavor: Forged in the frigid wastes of the north to honor the famed Schaefer artisans.

name: Schaefer's Hammer

custom.name: Lightning Charge Damage
custom.format: Casting a Lightning skill charges you with Lightning, causing you to deal %d%% weapon damage as Lightning every second for 5 seconds to nearby enemies.

flavor: Forged in the frigid wastes of the north to honor the famed Schaefer artisans.

name: Scourge

custom.name: Chance to Explode With Fury
custom.format: %d%% chance to explode with demonic fury when attacking.

flavor: A weapon of such evil visage is rarely seen outside the confines of the Burning Hells.

name: Scrimshaw
flavor: The head of this spear was carved from the tusk of a great horned goliath and is decorated with fine carvings depicting the Battle of Viz-jun.

name: Scrimshaw

custom.name: Zombie Charger Cost Reduction
custom.format: Reduces the Mana cost of Zombie Charger by %d%%.

flavor: The head of this spear was carved from the tusk of a great horned goliath and is decorated with fine carvings depicting the Battle of Viz-jun.

name: Scythe of the Cycle

custom.name: Secondary Skill Damage Bonus
custom.format: Your Secondary skills deal %d%% additional damage while Bone Armor is active but reduce the remaining duration of Bone Armor by 4 seconds.

flavor: "The Great Cycle of Being always begins anew... but not for you." �Master Necromancer Jostan

name: Scythe of the Cycle

custom.name: Secondary Skill Damage Bonus
custom.format: Your Secondary skills deal %d%% additional damage while Bone Armor is active but reduce the remaining duration of Bone Armor by 4 seconds.

flavor: "The Great Cycle of Being always begins anew... but not for you." �Master Necromancer Jostan

name: Sebor's Nightmare

custom.name: Haunt When Opening Chests
custom.format: Haunt is cast on all nearby enemies when you open a chest.

flavor: Sebor's Nightmare can easily make the difference between staying in this land or passing on to the next. For, though highly unlikely, the opening of a chest can have dire results on occasion.

name: Sebor's Nightmare

custom.name: Haunt When Opening Chests
custom.format: Haunt is cast on 5 nearby enemies when you open a chest.

flavor: Sebor's Nightmare can easily make the difference between staying in this land or passing on to the next. For, though highly unlikely, the opening of a chest can have dire results on occasion.

name: See No Evil
flavor: Evil cannot touch one who sees only the light.

name: Serpent's Sparker

custom.name: Extra Hydra
custom.format: You may have one extra Hydra active at a time.

flavor: Legend says this wand was fashioned from a fang of the original Hydra, defeated centuries ago by the hero Bul-Kathos. The great serpent was said to spawn two heads for every one that was severed. In order to defeat it, the mighty nephalem supposedly pitched the beast into a roaring bonfire, wresting the fang loose in the process.

name: Sever

custom.name: Slain enemies rest in pieces
custom.format: Slain enemies rest in pieces.

flavor: Jayesh smiled to himself. He had never seen a blade so perfectly suited for dismembering demons.

name: The Shame of Delsere

custom.name: Arcane Power Gain
custom.format: Your Signature Spells attack 50% faster and restore %d Arcane Power.

flavor: Unable to make this belt work with his Magnum Opus, Delsere rejected it out of hand and forbade anyone from using it. Ever.

name: Shard of Hate

custom.name: Effect Damage
custom.format:
Elemental skills have a chance to trigger a powerful attack that deals %d%% weapon damage:
   Cold skills trigger Freezing Skull
   Poison skills trigger Poison Nova
   Lightning skills trigger Charged Bolt

flavor: �Would that all the misbegotten spawn of my wayward daughter had but one heart I might plunge this through, so that they all might enjoy the gift of my pitiless ire.� -Mephisto to Hephasto, Chief Weaponsmith of the Burning Hells, upon the delivery of this blade

name: Shi Mizu's Haori

custom.name: Critical Health Threshold
custom.format: While below %d%% Life, all attacks are guaranteed Critical Hits.

flavor: "Being near death tends to focus the mind." �Shi Mizu, Warrior-Philosopher

name: Shield of Fury

custom.name: Heaven's Fury Ramp Up
custom.format: Each time an enemy takes damage from your Heaven's Fury, it increases the damage they take from your Heaven's Fury by %d%%.

flavor: Those who deny the Light will be forced to reckon with its power.

name: Shield of Fury

custom.name: Heaven's Fury Ramp Up
custom.format: Each time an enemy takes damage from your Heaven's Fury, it increases the damage they take from your Heaven's Fury by %d%%.

flavor: Those who deny the Light will be forced to reckon with its power.

name: The Short Man's Finger

custom.name: Baby Gargantuans
custom.format: Gargantuan instead summons three smaller gargantuans that have their damage increased by 200%%.

flavor: This finger belonged to an Umbaru priest who had lost his legs and would summon smaller gargantuans to carry him to rituals. Although he has long since gone to Mbwiru Eikura, his finger remains a conduit to his strange practices.

name: The Short Man's Finger

custom.name: Baby Gargantuan Damage
custom.format: Gargantuan instead summons three smaller gargantuans that have their damage increased by %d%%.

flavor: This finger belonged to an Umbaru priest who had lost his legs and would summon smaller gargantuans to carry him to rituals. Although he has long since gone to Mbwiru Eikura, his finger remains a conduit to his strange practices.

name: Shukrani's Triumph

custom.name: Endless Spirit Walk
custom.format: Spirit Walk lasts until you attack or until an enemy is within 30 yards of you.

flavor: The inhuman organ set into the center of this mojo once belonged to the demon Zagraal. At the end of a titanic battle during which all of her fellows were slain, the surviving witch doctor carved the still-beating heart from the fallen demon. Mounting it in a spirit cage, Shukrani harnessed the dark power of the heart that she might stride the realm of Mbwiru Eikura unchallenged.

name: Silver Star Piercers
flavor: Crafted from the finest silver. Sleek and elegant.

name: Sin Seekers

custom.name: Rapid Fire Has no Channel Cost
custom.format: Rapid Fire no longer has a channel cost.

flavor: Bolts pulled from this quiver instinctively seek out demonic blood.

name: Sin Seekers
flavor: Bolts pulled from this quiver instinctively seek out demonic blood.

name: Skeleton Key

custom.name: Follower Cannot Die
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.

flavor: This complex-cut, multi-toothed key will open virtually any lock.

name: Skelon's Deceit
flavor: These pants are the result of an unfortunate bargain struck between the demon Skelon and an unwitting human.

name: Skorn
flavor: The demon L'Anzuul wielded his vile axe Skorn with great venom and wrath before he was brought low by the forces of Heaven.

name: Skular's Salvation

custom.name: Boulder Toss Damage Bonus
custom.format: Increase the damage of Ancient Spear - Boulder Toss by 100%%. When your Boulder Toss hits 5 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: Skular was one of the few Barbarians to survive Baal's destruction of Sescheron. These bracers are the reason.

name: Skull Grasp

custom.name: Whirlwind Damage
custom.format: Increase the damage of Whirlwind by %d%% weapon damage.

flavor: Unscrupulous merchants have often duplicated this much sought-after ring to sell to the unwary.

name: Skull Grasp

custom.name: Whirlwind Damage
custom.format: Increase the damage of Whirlwind by %d%%.

flavor: Unscrupulous merchants have often duplicated this much sought-after ring to sell to the unwary.

name: Skull Grasp
flavor: Unscrupulous merchants have often duplicated this much sought-after ring to sell to the unwary.

name: Skull Grasp

custom.name: Whirlwind Damage
custom.format: Increase the damage of Whirlwind by %d%%

flavor: Unscrupulous merchants have often duplicated this much sought-after ring to sell to the unwary.

name: Skull of Resonance

custom.name: Threatening Shout Charms Enemies
custom.format: Threatening Shout has a chance to Charm enemies and cause them to join your side.

flavor: This macabre helm was hollowed out in such a way as to concentrate and disperse sounds in a focused manner.

name: Sky Splitter

custom.name: Chance to Smite
custom.format: %d%% chance to smite enemies with lightning when you hit them.

flavor: Some say this is the very axe wielded by an ancient god to split the sky from the land.

name: Sky Splitter

custom.name: Chance to Smite
custom.format: %d%% chance to Smite enemies for 600-750%% weapon damage as Lightning when you hit them.

flavor: Some say this is the very axe wielded by an ancient god to split the sky from the land.

name: Skycutter

custom.name: Chance to Summon Angels
custom.format: Chance to summon angelic assistance when attacking.

flavor: "The demons could not stand before the swords of the angelic Host, and their blood ran upon the fields of eternity." �The Books of Jarl, Volume III

name: Skywarden

custom.name: Gain Random Laws
custom.format: Every 60 seconds, gain a random Law for 60 seconds.

flavor: Favored weapon of the angelic Host.

name: Slave Bonds
flavor: Broken chains still dangle from these heavy iron shackles.

name: Sledge Fist
flavor: "The Mighty Bear brought low the great house of the guild with a single blow. Their greed was laid bare in the ruination." �Chronicles of the North

name: Slipka's Letter Opener

custom.name: Reduce Follower Cooldowns
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%%.

flavor: Thieves have whispered for centuries of the Grand Vizier Slipka, who could use his letter opener to gut three men, pick two locks, and open the mail, all in the time it took most men to draw their clumsy daggers.

name: Slorak's Madness

custom.name: This wand finds your death humorous
custom.format: This wand finds your death humorous.

flavor: Slorak saved himself by channeling his madness�and his power�into this wand.

name: Smoking Thurible

custom.name: Follower Cannot Die
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.

flavor: The pungent smoke emanating from this censer serves to clear the mind, aiding in concentration and magical castings.

name: The Smoldering Core

custom.name: Lure to Meteors
custom.format: Lesser enemies are now lured to your Meteor impact areas.

flavor: "After Azmodan�s death, I sent a squad of men to block the path to the crater. Only one of them returned, bearing this strange weapon. He was badly burned�his armor had melted into his skin in places. He perished a few hours later. We threw the staff over the walls, hoping never to see it again." �Captain Haile of Bastion�s Keep

name: Solanium

custom.name: Chance to Spawn Globe on Criticals
custom.format: Critical Hits have a %d%% chance to spawn a health globe.

flavor: This mace once belonged to a holy man who reluctantly took up arms against a demon invasion. As a worshiper of the sun, Graham called his weapon Solanium, meaning "bearer of the sun's light." The longer Graham struggled against the forces of darkness, the more his faith grew infused within the mace, until the mundane object became an item of immense righteous power.

name: Soulsmasher

custom.name: Life per Kill to Explosion
custom.format: When you kill an enemy, it explodes for %d%% of your Life per Kill as damage to all enemies within 20 yards. You no longer benefit from your Life per Kill.

flavor: "This massive mace does more than merely slay its victims. It quite literally shatters their souls, releasing the energy contained within in a massive blast. If it was indeed crafted by my brother Malthael, as I suspect, it may have been a failed first attempt to free human souls for his consumption. How long, I wonder, had his madness gone unnoticed by those closest to him?" �Tyrael, Aspect of Wisdom

name: Spaulders of Zakara

custom.name: Items Become Indestructible
custom.format: Your items become indestructible.

flavor: "A dying crusader emerged from the Aranoch wastes bearing these spaulders. She claimed to have been visited by the angel Yaerius in the desert depths and charged with delivering these artifacts into the hands of men so the crusade might triumph. Whatever the truth of her claims, there is little doubt the spaulders are the product of Heaven's forges." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Spear of Jairo

custom.name: Bonus Thorns per Cursed Enemy
custom.format: Your Thorns is increased by %d%% for every enemy afflicted by one of your curses.

flavor: "An enemy's suffering is naught but the greatest pleasure." �Necromancer Jairo

name: Spectrum
flavor: This fantastical blade is the physical manifestation of unicorn smiles, bright rainbow colors, shooting star wishes, and teddy bear giggles.

name: The Spider Queen's Grasp

custom.name: Corpse Spiders Slow Enemies
custom.format: Corpse Spiders releases a web on impact that Slows enemies by %d%%.

flavor: The blessing of Araneae drips from this blade.

name: Spines of Seething Hatred

custom.name: Chakram Generates Hatred
custom.format: Chakram now generates %d Hatred.

flavor: Seeing their enemies flayed serves only to fuel the thirst for revenge that burns within a demon hunter�s breast.

name: Spirit Guards

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: Your Spirit Generators reduce your damage taken by %d%% for 3 seconds.

flavor: The Patriarchs say that when the spirit waxes, the dangers of this world wane.

name: Spirit Guards

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: Your Spirit Generators reduce your damage taken by %d%% for 3 seconds.

flavor: The Patriarchs say that when the spirit waxes, the dangers of this world wane.

name: Spite
flavor: You hold your enemy's future in your hand.

name: Split Tusk
flavor: Carved to evoke the power of the great tusked pack beasts of the Teganze.

name: Squirt's Necklace
flavor: An unassuming chunk of stone covered with runes. The name of Kantwirt, the ancient god of thieves, is scratched onto its back.

name: St. Archew's Gage

custom.name: Absorb Shield
custom.format: The first time an elite pack damages you, gain an absorb shield for %d%% of your maximum Life for 10 seconds.

flavor: "Archew, the Saint of Entsteig, is remembered for his many duels with the ruffians of that city. It was said that his gauntlet lay on the street more often than on his hand." �Archibald Kerne

name: St. Archew's Gage

custom.name: Absorb Shield
custom.format: When there are 5 or more enemies within 12 yards, you gain an absorb shield equal to %d%% of your maximum Life for 6 seconds. This effect may occur once every 30 seconds.

flavor: "Archew, the Saint of Entsteig, is remembered for his many duels with the ruffians of that city. It was said that his gauntlet lay on the street more often than on his hand." �Archibald Kerne

name: Staff of Chiroptera

custom.name: Firebats Cost Reduction
custom.format: Firebats attacks 100%% faster, costs %d%% less Mana, and has its damage increased by 60%%.

flavor: Without the correct tools, forming energy into Firebats can be taxing.

name: Staff of Chiroptera

custom.name: Firebats Cost Reduction
custom.format: Firebats attacks 100%% faster, costs 75%% less Mana, and has its damage increased by %d%%.

flavor: Without the correct tools, forming energy into Firebats can be taxing.

name: Staff of Kyro
flavor: "For more than a century, this simple white wax wood staff braided in red shagreen has served as the badge of office for the high abbot of the Kyro temple. During that time, thousands of inattentive young monks have come to find that their master�s old staff has surprising reach." �Archimandrite Cyprian

name: Stalgard's Decimator

custom.name: Piercing Axe Damage
custom.format: Your melee attacks throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy, dealing %d%% weapon damage as Physical.

flavor: Stalgard was a bloodthirsty warlord whose forces briefly controlled the trade routes of the southern plains. He was famed for engaging in duels with the best swordsman of any caravan who dared pass through his territory, offering to let it proceed unmolested if its champion triumphed. Of course, he was equally famed for cheating if he began to lose said duels.

name: Standoff
flavor: With this, one warrior can hold back an army.

name: Standoff

custom.name: Furious Charge Bonus Damage
custom.format: Furious Charge deals increased damage equal to %d%% of your bonus movement speed.

flavor: With this, one warrior can hold back an army.

name: Standoff

custom.name: Furious Charge Bonus Damage
custom.format: Furious Charge deals increased damage equal to %d%% of your bonus movement speed.

flavor: With this, one warrior can hold back an army.

name: The Star of Azkaranth

custom.name: Fire Absorb
custom.format: Prevent all Fire damage taken and heal yourself for %d% of the amount prevented.

flavor: Imbued with Azkaranth's immense powers with his dying breath.

name: Starfire
flavor: Crafted around a shard that fell from the sky during the Festival of Lights.

name: Starfire

custom.name: Lightning Damage Bonus
custom.format: Lightning damage is increased by %d%% for every 10 yards you are from the target up to a maximum of 40 yards.

flavor: Crafted around a shard that fell from the sky during the Festival of Lights.

name: Starmetal Kukri

custom.name: Fetishes Reduce Cooldowns on Hit
custom.format: Reduce the cooldown of Fetish Army and Big Bad Voodoo by 1 second each time your fetishes deal damage.

flavor: "Szab the necromancer was the first outsider to meet the people of the Teganze. He attempted to explain the philosophy of the necromancers to them, but the language barrier proved to be too great�instead of relaying his philosophical beliefs, he told them he was Trag'Oul, and that he lived among the stars." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Steady Strikers
flavor: You need only intend to strike your target, and your hands will wield the weapon with the confidence of a seasoned veteran.

name: Steuart's Greaves

custom.name: Blood Rush Movement Speed
custom.format: You gain %d%% increased movement speed for 10 seconds after using Blood Rush.

flavor: "Stand your ground firmly enough, and your foes may start to question their own standing." �Steuart the Bold

name: Steuart's Greaves

custom.name: Blood Rush Movement Speed
custom.format: You gain %d%% increased movement speed for 10 seconds after using Blood Rush.

flavor: "Stand your ground firmly enough, and your foes may start to question their own standing." �Steuart the Bold

name: Stolen Ring
flavor: "I could not believe my own good fortune, from the moment I found the ring abandoned on the forest trail until the time it was stolen from my quarters in Caldeum." �Covetous Shen

name: Stone Gauntlets
flavor: Heavy. Stone. Brutal.

name: Stone of Jordan
flavor: The Stone of Jordan is far more valuable than its appearance would suggest. Men have given much to possess it.

name: Storm Crow

custom.name: Chance to Cast Fiery Ball
custom.format: %d%% chance to cast a fiery ball when attacking.

flavor: "When the sky was torn from the sea, Storm Crow appeared from within the thundering clouds to grant mankind dominion over the living flame." �Legends of the Forgotten World

name: Stormshield
flavor: Ashusk had never seen metal like this before. It seemed to be charged with the power of the thundering sky, repelling all attacks against it.

name: String of Ears

custom.name: Melee Damage Reduction
custom.format: Reduces damage from melee attacks by %d%%.

flavor: A proud fighter displays the ears of those he has slain in battle.

name: String of Ears
flavor: A proud fighter displays the ears of those he has slain in battle.

name: Strongarm Bracers

custom.name: Damage Bonus on Knockback
custom.format: Enemies hit by knockbacks suffer %d%% increased damage for 6 seconds.

flavor: A warrior wearing bracers made of Skartaran metal can best monsters twice his size.

name: Sublime Conviction

custom.name: Chance to Stun on Block
custom.format: When you block, you have up to a %d%% chance to Stun the attacker for 1.5 seconds based on your current Wrath.

flavor: The forces of shadow act in foolish haste. Maintain your focus, and you will defeat them with your righteous resolve.

name: The Sultan of the Blinding Sand
flavor: Forged by the finest smiths in Caldeum to commemorate the first emperor Hakan's ascension to the throne.

name: Sun Keeper
flavor: Long years before men civilized the land that would come to be known as Kurast, primitive shamans bludgeoned their human sacrifices with hellish devices.

name: Sunder

custom.name: Chance to Sunder the Ground
custom.format: %d%% chance to sunder the ground your enemies walk on when you attack.

flavor: A weapon of myth and legend. Some say that to use it is folly�that it will rip the land asunder and boil the oceans.

name: SuWong Diviner

custom.name: Acid Cloud Gains Lob Blob Bomb
custom.format: Acid Cloud gains the effect of the Lob Blob Bomb rune.

flavor: "I followed the whispers of the spirits deep into the jungle, hoping to learn their secrets. Then I found the Diviner. SuWong's voice came to me clearly so long as I held it. He showed me the ways of the Unformed Land, and they became my ways as well." �Tendaji the Witch Doctor

name: The Swami

custom.name: Extra Archon Damage Duration
custom.format: The bonuses from Archon stacks now last for %d seconds after Archon expires.

flavor: Bestows upon the wearer both formidable power and an unsurpassed statement of fashion.

name: The Swami

custom.name: Extra Archon Damage Duration
custom.format: The damage bonus from kills while in Archon form now lasts for %d seconds after Archon expires.

flavor: Bestows upon the wearer both formidable power and an unsurpassed statement of fashion.

name: Swamp Land Waders
flavor: Specially crafted to withstand the rigors of the swamp lands.

name: Swamp Land Waders

custom.name: Sacrifice Damage Bonus
custom.format: Sacrifice deals %d%% additional damage against enemies affected by Locust Swarm or Grasp of the Dead.

flavor: Specially crafted to withstand the rigors of the swamp lands.

name: Swiftmount

custom.name: Double Steed Charge Duration
custom.format: Doubles the duration of Steed Charge.

flavor: Bearers of this flail ride like the wind when they call upon their celestial steeds. This fact may cause extreme envy when used around horseless nephalem.

name: Sword of Ill Will

custom.name: Chakram Damage Bonus
custom.format: Chakram deals %.1f%% increased damage for every point of Hatred you have.

flavor: Hate is a powerful weapon that can destroy even the best of us. So tread lightly.

name: Sydyru Crust
flavor: Carved from the bones of the dreaded giant sydyru demon.

name: Talisman of Aranoch

custom.name: Cold Absorb
custom.format: Prevent all Cold damage taken and heal yourself for %d%% of the amount prevented.

flavor: The heat of the blazing desert protects one from the cold.

name: The Tall Man's Finger

custom.name: Gargantuan Dog
custom.format: Zombie Dogs instead summons a single gargantuan dog with more damage and health than all other dogs combined.

flavor: This finger was severed from the hand of an Umbaru priest who crossed over to Mbwiru Eikura in search of knowledge and came back... changed. Before the unclean phantasm was finally slain, he evinced great power over the dead, and this metal-plated digit still possesses some of that power.

name: Tasker and Theo

custom.name: Pet Attack Speed
custom.format: Increase attack speed of your pets by %d%%.

flavor: The master and his hound were the most famed hunters of their day. He died fighting beside his favorite dog, just as the way he would have wanted it. His loyal companion soon followed.

name: Telranden's Hand
flavor: As the battle between Horazon and the Warlord of Blood raged, and the walls of Viz-jun fell, Telranden led the fight against Bartuc's demon hordes and saved many from certain death.

name: Thing of the Deep

custom.name: Pickup Radius
custom.format: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by 20 yards.

flavor: A terrifying being spawned from the primordial depths. To gaze upon it is enough to drive one mad. Currently disguised as a frog.

name: Thing of the Deep
flavor: A terrifying being spawned from the primordial depths. To gaze upon it is enough to drive one mad. Currently disguised as a frog.

name: The Three Hundredth Spear
flavor: They fought against incredible odds, down to the last warrior.

name: The Three Hundredth Spear

custom.name: Thrown Damage Bonus
custom.format: Increase the damage of Weapon Throw and Ancient Spear by %d%%.

flavor: They fought against incredible odds, down to the last warrior.

name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

custom.name: Did someone say [Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker]?
custom.format: Chance on hit to blast your enemy with Lightning, dealing %d%% weapon damage as Lightning and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Each enemy hit has their attack speed and movement speed reduced by 30%% for 3 seconds. Jumps up to 5 targets.
