flavor: This ancient blade, imbued with unpredictable elemental energies, crossed vast universes and hidden dimensions before arriving in Sanctuary. Thunderfury seeks the hand of a true hero, one capable of safely wielding its awesome power.

name: Thundergod's Vigor

custom.name: Lightning Bolts Damage
custom.format: Blocking, dodging or being hit causes you to discharge bolts of electricity that deal %d%% weapon damage as Lightning.

flavor: "And the god of thunder struck down transgressors with great fury and vengeance..." �Scrolls of Haroutunian

name: Tiklandian Visage

custom.name: Horrify Duration
custom.format: Horrify causes you to Fear and Root enemies around you for %d seconds.

flavor: The fierce visage of Enobakhare, the spirit father of the small remote village of Tiklan.

name: The Tormentor

custom.name: Chance to Charm Enemies
custom.format: Chance to charm enemies when you hit them.

flavor: This staff was made with only one goal in mind: to cause great pain.

custom.name: Spike Trap Bonuses
custom.format: Spike Traps gain the Impaling Spines rune and are deployed twice as fast.

name: Trag'Oul Coils

custom.name: Cooldown Reduction From Healing Wells
custom.format: Healing wells replenish all resources and reduce all cooldowns by %d seconds.

flavor: "The guardian shall ever maintain his eternal watch over those who serve and protect the balance." �Excerpt from the Books of Kalan

name: Trag'Oul's Corroded Fang

custom.name: Bonus Damage to Cursed
custom.format: The Cursed Scythe rune for Grim Scythe now has a 100%% chance to apply a curse and you deal %d%% increased damage to cursed enemies.

flavor: It whispers your name from realms beyond.

name: Triumvirate

custom.name: Arcane Orb Damage Increase
custom.format: Your Signature Spells increase the damage of Arcane Orb by %d%% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

flavor: The Triumvirate is composed of the three basic elements of creation.

name: Triumvirate
flavor: The Triumvirate is composed of the three basic elements of creation.

name: Triumvirate

custom.name: Arcane Orb Damage Increase
custom.format: Your Signature Spells increase the damage of Arcane Orb by %d%% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

flavor: The Triumvirate is composed of the three basic elements of creation.

name: Triumvirate

custom.name: Arcane Orb Damage Increase
custom.format: Your Signature Spells increase the damage of Arcane Orb by %d%% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

flavor: The Triumvirate is composed of the three basic elements of creation.

name: The Twisted Sword

custom.name: Energy Twister Damage Bonus
custom.format: Energy Twister damage is increased by %d%% for each Energy Twister you have out up to a maximum of 5.

flavor: �Li-Ming was always experimenting. She imbued this sword with an unfathomable combination of spells that saved her life on more than one occasion. She was obviously a genius - but I�ll deny ever saying that.� - High Councilor Valthek

name: Tyrael's Might
flavor: "And lo, the Angel of Justice did cast his judgment in favor of the nephalem." �The Books of Jarl, Volume III

name: Tzo Krin's Gaze

custom.name: Wave of Light Cast at Enemy
custom.format: Wave of Light is now cast at your enemy.

flavor: The old warrior came to Tzo Krin to ask how to settle his troubled mind. "Bring me your mind, and I will settle it." Upon hearing this, the old warrior immediately achieved enlightenment.

name: Uhkapian Serpent

custom.name: Redirect Damage to Zombie Dogs
custom.format: %d%% of the damage you take is redirected to your Zombie Dogs.

flavor: The uhkapian serpent's venom weakens the veil between this world and the Unformed Land.

name: Unbound Bolt
flavor: Many a hero has wielded this bow through many an age, and the tales sung of it can be heard from one end of the world to the other.

name: The Undisputed Champion

custom.name: Frenzy Gains All Runes
custom.format: Frenzy gains the effect of every rune.

flavor: Few in this world can truly be called champions.

name: The Undisputed Champion
flavor: Few in this world can truly be called champions.

name: Unity

custom.name: Split Damage
custom.format: All damage taken is split between wearers of this item.

flavor: A symbol of peace, love and togetherness for all mankind. Also good for leaving an imprint on someone's head.

name: Unrelenting Phalanx

custom.name: Phalanx now casts twice
custom.format: Phalanx now casts twice.

flavor: The best defense is an overwhelming offense.

name: Unstable Scepter

custom.name: Double Arcane Orb Explosion
custom.format: The damage of Arcane Orb is increased by 65%% and its explosion triggers an additional time.

flavor: �Yet another item allegedly taken from Vyr�s armory after his demise. It uses the inherent instability of Arcane power to enhance its destructive efficiency.� - High Councilor Valthek�s Compendium of Exotic Weaponry

name: Unstable Scepter

custom.name: Arcane Orb Damage Bonus
custom.format: The damage of Arcane Orb is increased by %d%% and its explosion triggers an additional time.

flavor: �Yet another item allegedly taken from Vyr�s armory after his demise. It uses the inherent instability of Arcane power to enhance its destructive efficiency.� - High Councilor Valthek�s Compendium of Exotic Weaponry

name: Uskang
flavor: Hewn from the roots of the sacred angaza tree.

name: Uskang
flavor: Hewn from the roots of the sacred angaza tree.

name: Utar's Roar
flavor: "Utar's mighty blade was colder than the bitterest winter chill, hewn from the never-melting ice of the summit of Mount Paolarr." �Chronicles of the North

name: Vadim's Surge

custom.name: Reduce Follower Cooldowns
custom.format: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%%.

flavor: Master Vadim found that in his later years, it took him longer to recover from each spellcasting. He created a focus that would allow him to cast much more quickly, but soon after fell prey to dementia and became quite dangerous.

name: Valla's Bequest

custom.name: Strafe Pierce
custom.format: Strafe projectiles pierce.

flavor: Valla was one of the most lethal Demon Hunters ever known, until her abrupt disappearance. Some claim that she still lives, fighting in another land. Her body was never found, but she did leave behind her prized possession: this bow.

name: Valthek's Rebuke

custom.name: Energy Twister Travels in a Straight Path
custom.format: Energy Twister now travels in a straight path.

flavor: This staff was the property of the high councilor of the Vizjerei and master of the mage clans of the Yshari Sanctum. It disappeared shortly after an incident with a rebellious student.

name: Vambraces of Sescheron

custom.name: Primary Skills Heal
custom.format: Your primary skills heal you for %.1f%% of your missing Life.

flavor: �These look to be of Sescheron origin to me. Strange though - when others use them, they are nothing special. When you use them, well...� � Haedrig

name: Velvet Camaral

custom.name: Double Electrocute Jumps
custom.format: Double the number of enemies your Electrocute jumps to.

flavor: This flamboyant headdress was fashioned long ago by a fashion-conscious Harakas mage to make an impression at a peace summit between her clan and the Sarandesh. The highly conductive properties that make it so valuable in combat were merely a happy accident. Regardless, when the meeting of the clans turned violent, it was those attributes that made the more lasting impact.

name: Vengeful Wind

custom.name: Extra Sweeping Wind Stacks
custom.format: Increases the maximum stack count of Sweeping Wind by %d.

flavor: �Some learned people say that evil cannot be overcome through violence. I say there is no other way.� -Akyev the Unyielding

name: Vengeful Wind

custom.name: Extra Sweeping Wind Stacks
custom.format: Increases the maximum stack count of Sweeping Wind by 3.

flavor: �Some learned people say that evil cannot be overcome through violence. I say there is no other way.� -Akyev the Unyielding

name: Vigilance

custom.name: Chance to Cast Inner Sanctuary
custom.format: Getting hit has a chance to automatically cast Inner Sanctuary.

flavor: "One who stands in defense of others will find her inner strength." �The Cadence of Battle

name: Vigilante Belt
flavor: He stalked his prey by dark of night, separating the evil ones from their lives.

name: Vile Hive

custom.name: Locust Swarm Damage Bonus
custom.format: Locust Swarm gains the effect of the Pestilence rune and deals %d%% increased damage.

flavor: "Who sees an oozing, vermin-filled nest hanging from a branch and says, 'That is exactly what I was hoping to carry around all day'?" �Lyndon the Scoundrel

name: Vile Ward
flavor: Surprisingly, the taint of foul evil seeping from these ancient demon skulls protects the wearer from harm.

name: Vile Ward

custom.name: Furious Charge Bonus Damage
custom.format: Furious Charge deals %d%% increased damage for every enemy hit while charging.

flavor: "The more enemies I hit, the greater my bloodlust." -Chieftain Kar-Nuk

name: Visage of Giyua

custom.name: Summon Fetish Army
custom.format: Summon a Fetish Army after you kill 2 Elites.

flavor: Eternal Giyua, guardian of the Unformed Land, blesses the worthy champion with the gift of her children.

name: Visage of Gunes

custom.name: Vengeance Gains Dark Heart Rune
custom.format: Vengeance gains the effect of the Dark Heart rune.

flavor: The hunter Gunes would never reveal the origins of this helmet. Some say it contained the essences of demons who had suffered his vengeance. They also claim it was the cause of his downfall.

name: Vo'Toyias Spiker

custom.name: Provoke Doubles Thorns Damage
custom.format: Enemies affected by Provoke take double damage from Thorns.

flavor: The demon smith Vo'Toyias designed this shield to inflict great injury upon those daring to attack its bearer. The wicked brass spikes that bristle along the shield's surface make it a formidable weapon in its own right, however, allowing its wielder to make deadly counterattacks.

name: Voo's Juicer

custom.name: Spirit Barrage Gains Extra Runes
custom.format: Spirit Barrage gains the effects of the Phlebotomize and The Spirit is Willing runes.

flavor: There is nothing humorous about the way this dagger feeds off the souls of your enemies.

name: Wall of Man

custom.name: Chance to Gain Shield of Bones
custom.format: %d%% chance to be protected by a shield of bones when you are hit.

flavor: Named for the Battle of Josqueira, a conflict so long and fierce that men used the skeletons of their fallen comrades to build fortifications.

name: Wand of Woh

custom.name: Explosive Blast Damage Bonus
custom.format: The damage of Explosive Blast is increased by %d%% and 3 additional blasts are triggered after casting Explosive Blast.

flavor: Long before Xiansai's unification, in a time of legend, the mercurial mage Woh and his companions whisked their way across the land in a magical pagoda, righting wrongs and putting an end to strife. Woh has since been reincarnated many times, but in each incarnation, this wand invariably finds its way back to its master's hand.

name: Wand of Woh

custom.name: Quadruple Explosive Blast
custom.format: The damage of Explosive Blast is increased by 100%% and 3 additional blasts are triggered after casting Explosive Blast.

flavor: Long before Xiansai's unification, in a time of legend, the mercurial mage Woh and his companions whisked their way across the land in a magical pagoda, righting wrongs and putting an end to strife. Woh has since been reincarnated many times, but in each incarnation, this wand invariably finds its way back to its master's hand.

name: War of the Dead
flavor: Only the dead have seen the end of war.

name: Warhelm of Kassar

custom.name: Phalanx Damage and Cooldown
custom.format: Reduce the cooldown and increase the damage of Phalanx by %d%%.

flavor: At Akkhan's request, Kassar trained the first Crusaders, turning them into skillful warriors through his rigorous methods. His own apprentices faced harsher trials and were each lost in training, unable to carry on his name. --Abd al-Hazir, The Crusaders

name: Warmonger
flavor: Brandished by the demon Draorm at the Fifth Battle of the Diamond Gates.

name: Warstaff of General Quang

custom.name: Tempest Rush Gains Tailwind
custom.format: Tempest Rush gains the effect of the Tailwind rune.

flavor: "When he took the field himself, the General bore a demon-visaged staff shaped with a number of protrusions and barbs designed for tripping, disarming, and dismounting his opponents. Witnesses described the General moving through armies like a blur, leaving behind swaths of prone troops for his bodyguards to dispatch." �A History of War by Lord Jerem Kiel

name: Warzechian Armguards

custom.name: Speed After Breaking Objects
custom.format: Every time you destroy a wreckable object, you gain a short burst of speed.

flavor:
"After a long search through the eastern lands, the noble leaders of House Chien chose the Haroutunian 
Clan for their personal guard. These loyal protectors are easily recognized by the distinctive armguards they wear out of pride for their service." �Abd al-Hazir, The Xiansai Chronicles

name: Wildwood
flavor: A heavy and mysterious sword, once carried by the rangers of Wildwood.

name: Wilken's Reach

custom.name: Grasp of the Dead Has no Cooldown
custom.format: Grasp of the Dead no longer has a cooldown.

flavor: "I studied the relationship between the Umbaru and the dead. And it is safe to say that their grasp matches their reach." -High Scholar Wilken

name: Windforce
flavor: The wind carries life for those enveloped in its flow, and death for those arrayed against it.

name: Winter Flurry

custom.name: Frost Nova on Kill
custom.format: Enemies killed by Cold damage have a %d%% chance to release a Frost Nova.

flavor: The power of the cold death of winter is not something to be taken lightly.

name: Wisdom of Kalan

custom.name: Max Bone Armor Stacks
custom.format: Increases the maximum stacks of Bone Armor by 5.

flavor: "All we know may yet come to a great and terrible end if we do not intervene." �Excerpt from the Books of Kalan

name: The Witching Hour
flavor: When the moon is full and silence descends upon the land, the hour of magic is upon us.

name: Wizardspike

custom.name: Chance to Hurl Frozen Orb
custom.format: Performing an attack has a %d%% chance to hurl a Frozen Orb.

flavor: The energies of forbidden magics course through this blade.

name: Wojahnni Assaulter

custom.name: Rapid Fire Ramp-Up
custom.format: Rapid Fire deals %d%% increased damage for every half second that you channel. Stacks up to 4 times.

flavor: Because of the consummate skill required to construct them, Wojahnni heavy crossbows are reserved for the officer class. As the Assaulter's effectiveness is essential to the nation's military superiority, they are seldom found intact outside of Wojahn since there is a simple peg inserted in the weapon that, when pulled, causes it to fall to pieces.

name: Wojahnni Assaulter

custom.name: Rapid Fire Ramp-Up
custom.format: Rapid Fire deals %d%% increased damage for every second that you channel. Stacks up to 4 times.

flavor: Because of the consummate skill required to construct them, Wojahnni heavy crossbows are reserved for the officer class. As the Assaulter's effectiveness is essential to the nation's military superiority, they are seldom found intact outside of Wojahn since there is a simple peg inserted in the weapon that, when pulled, causes it to fall to pieces.

name: Won Khim Lau
flavor: Directs the wayward's gaze to the heavens that he may benefit from the glory of the gods.

name: Wormwood

custom.name: Locust Swarm Autocast
custom.format: Locust Swarm is cast on a nearby enemy every second.

flavor: The poisonous hatred of many a man was harnessed to create this staff.

name: Wormwood
flavor: The poisonous hatred of many a man was harnessed to create this staff.

name: Wraps of Clarity

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: Your Hatred Generators reduce your damage taken by %d%% for 5 seconds.

flavor: Steadies the arm and brings calm certainty in the face of death.

name: Wraps of Clarity

custom.name: Damage Reduction
custom.format: Your Hatred Generators reduce your damage taken by %d%% for 5 seconds.

flavor: Steadies the arm and brings calm certainty in the face of death.

name: Wrath of the Bone King
flavor: Used by the Skeleton King to punish those who would stand against him.

name: Wrath of the Bone King
flavor: Used by the Skeleton King to punish those who would stand against him.

name: Wyrdward

custom.name: Chance to Stun With Lightning Damage
custom.format: Lightning damage has a %d%% chance to Stun for 1.5 seconds.

flavor: This ring was crudely crafted by a barbarian wise woman from the fulgurite left behind after a lightning strike. It still possessed a strong connection to the force that birthed it, and the wise woman used its power to strengthen her own magics in order to defend her tribe from Westmarch invaders.

name: Wyrdward

custom.name: Chance to Stun With Lightning Damage
custom.format: Lightning damage has a %d%% chance to Stun for 1.5 seconds.

flavor: This ring was crudely crafted by a barbarian wise woman from the fulgurite left behind after a lightning strike. It still possessed a strong connection to the force that birthed it, and the wise woman used its power to strengthen her own magics in order to defend her tribe from Westmarch invaders.

name: Xephirian Amulet

custom.name: Lightning Absorb
custom.format: Prevent all Lightning damage taken and heal yourself for %d% of the amount prevented.

flavor: Some say Xephiria is but a myth, a fanciful place that never existed. The power of this amulet says otherwise.

name: Yang's Recurve

custom.name: Multishot Damage
custom.format: Multishot attacks 50%% faster and its damage is increased by %d%%.

flavor: A terrifying Demon Hunter from Xiansai, Yang was known for his resourcefulness, his prowess at multishot, and his icy contempt for failure.

name: Yang's Recurve

custom.name: Multishot Speed
custom.format: Multishot attacks 50%% faster.

flavor: A terrifying Demon Hunter from Xiansai, Yang was known for his resourcefulness, his prowess at multishot, and his icy contempt for failure.

name: Zoey's Secret

custom.name: Damage Reduction Per Companion
custom.format: You take %.1f%% less damage for every Companion you have active.

flavor: Zoey First-Blood displayed enormous luck on the battlefield, surviving blasts that killed her fellow demon hunters Kairo Nontooth, Aidan Longcollar, and Oliver Manyhair. Only after the Order of Villamar discovered that her belt deflected damage onto her colleagues did she promise to alter it so that damage would not hit those around her.

name: The Zweihander
flavor: Longsword favored by Heuerman and the loyalists during the Entsteig Rebellion.

name: Archangel's Staff of the Apocalypse
flavor: This staff bears an aura of foreboding. It is rumored to have been created by the Archangel Itherael.

name: Arkaine's Valor
flavor:
"Just before Arkaine died, his armor was hidden away in a secret vault. It is said that when this holy armor is again needed, a hero will arise to don Valor once more. Perhaps you are that hero..." 

�Deckard Cain

name: The Butcher's Cleaver
flavor: Encrusted in dried blood and gore, this cleaver still mysteriously smells of fresh meat.

name: Empyrean Band
flavor:
"I arranged pieces of the stone within a silver ring that my father left me. I hope it serves you well." 

�Griswold

name: Godly Plate of the Whale
flavor: This armor is so powerful that only the most conniving adventurers could dream of obtaining it.

name: Griswold's Edge
flavor:
"Give a man a sword and you can make him a warrior. Teach a man to forge and you can raise an army." 
-Griswold

name: Harlequin Crest
flavor:
" This cap was left in one of the rooms by a magician that stayed here some time ago. Perhaps it may be of some value to you." 

�Ogden

name: King's Sword of Haste
flavor: The royal blacksmith received an order to create this sword for King Leoric, but it was canceled a short time later, meaning this weapon never should have existed...

name: Optic Amulet
flavor: It seems to see what you see not...

name: Ring of Truth
flavor: The ring glitters with a subtle illumination that seems to drive back any nearby shadows.

name: The Undead Crown
flavor: This looks just like the crown of the Black King, but less tarnished and aged...

name: Veil of Steel
flavor:
"May those who wear this helm meet a better fate than my own, ever guided by loyalty and honor." 

�Lachdanan

name: Accursed Visage
flavor: �A demon hunter�s mind must be tuned precisely to the demonic will. Only then can you know the best vantage point for your attack. Waver and you are dead.� -Kovan the Merciless

name: Arachyr's Carapace
flavor: �Arachyr is often portrayed as a spider, but there is much debate as to how many legs he actually had.� -The Tomes of Creation

name: Arachyr's Claws
flavor: �The unpredictability of the children of Arachyr is also their strength.� -The Tomes of Creation

name: Arachyr's Legs
flavor: �Much like his uncontrollable children, it is said he can be charmed to do ones bidding-but often turns on his supplicants with no warning.� -The Tomes of Creation

name: Arachyr's Mantle
flavor: �Arachyr was the first of the beasts created for this world. As such, he is father to all others.� -The Tomes of Creation

name: Arachyr's Stride
flavor: �Contrary to popular belief, his actions are not capricious or spiteful - they always have a purpose. And that purpose is simply to amuse him.� -The Tomes of Creation

name: Arachyr's Visage
flavor: �Some creatures are born of chaos. They can be summoned, but never tamed.� -The Tomes of Creation

name: Asheara's Custodian
flavor: Asheara vows that no harm will ever befall one who is under the sworn protection of her Iron Wolves.

name: Asheara's Finders
flavor: The Iron Wolves have traveled far and done much in the last twenty years. From the docks of Kurast to the palaces of Caldeum, they upheld their duty until they were driven from the emperor's side by the Imperial Guard.

name: Asheara's Pace
flavor: Asheara envisioned this armor as a testament to the might of the Iron Wolves.

name: Asheara's Ward
flavor: These gloves represent the unspoken bond between Asheara and her mercenaries.

name: Aughild's Power
flavor: Aughild was the only warlord to successfully lay siege to Entsteig. But, in the end, it proved to be his undoing.

name: Aughild's Rule
flavor: Aughild's vestments were originally crafted to reflect both his savagery and his nobility.

name: Aughild's Search
flavor: Aughild had fifty demands that had to be met before he would spare the lives of the nobles. Those demands are written in the wrappings of these bracers.

name: Aughild's Spike
flavor: A detailed recreation of the ceremonial helmet Aughild used when he was crowned king of Entsteig.

name: Blackthorne's Duncraig Cross
flavor: The Duncraig Cross is awarded to those nobles who lead their knights to victory in defense of the realm.

name: Blackthorne's Jousting Mail
flavor: Tailored to exact specifications for comfort in riding, walking, fencing and jousting.

name: Blackthorne's Notched Belt
flavor: A thick leather belt, notched once for each enemy noble captured in battle, each man ransomed back to his family for a handsome fee.

name: Blackthorne's Spurs
flavor: The leather and scale joints provide improved flexibility for better foot positioning in dueling and stability in mounted combat.

name: Blackthorne's Surcoat
flavor: Baron Blackthorne led his knights to prevent the escape of King Leoric's forces during their defeat against Westmarch, forcing them to choose between surrender and death in the quagmire.

name: Born's Frozen Soul
flavor: This armor is designed after that worn by the famed warrior Born, who was known to rush headlong into battle against superior numbers with no thought for his own safety.

name: Born's Furious Wrath
flavor: Born often carried the day on nothing more than his unrelenting fury.

name: Born's Privilege
flavor: Many have tried and failed to duplicate the subtle qualities of Born's intricate armor�until now.

name: Breastplate of Akkhan
flavor: "Let each crusader's heart be protected by a breastplate of astounding strength, for the heart drives all else in the depths of battle." -Akkhan

name: Bul-Kathos's Solemn Vow
flavor: Bul-Kathos strode as a giant among the ancients, and was the forefather to the barbarian tribes. This sword represents the sacred vow he made to protect Mount Arreat and the Worldstone.

name: Bul-Kathos's Warrior Blood
flavor: A barbarian knows that Bul-Kathos's blood runs through his veins. It is what gives him his power and binds him to his people.

name: Burden of the Invoker
flavor: "My trial grew more harrowing with each passing day. The thorned figure continued to ambush from the mist, armor adorned with monstrous, heavy barbs that retaliated against my attacks and threatened to impale me." -- Olenna's journal

name: Cage of the Hellborn
flavor: �When a demon peers into your heart of hearts, demon hunter, what will he find? Death. Whether it is his or yours depends solely on you.� -Kovan the Merciless

name: Cain's Habit
flavor: Inspired by Deckard Cain's Horadric robes, these pants are perfect for those who, like Cain, have dedicated themselves to eradicating the demons' threat from this world.

name: Cain's Insight
flavor: This laurel represents the wisdom of the scholar Deckard Cain.

name: Cain's Scrivener
flavor: These wrappings are covered with Horadric symbols and runes, and are perfect for keeping your arms warm while you search for elusive arcane knowledge.

name: Cain's Travelers
flavor: Deckard Cain spent the last twenty years of his life traveling the world in search of information needed to defeat the Lords of Hell.

name: Captain Crimson's Silk Girdle
flavor: Patterned after the famed belt where Captain Crimson buckled his swash.

name: Captain Crimson's Thrust
flavor: Captain Crimson was known for his flamboyant dress, particularly his prodigious codpiece.

name: Captain Crimson's Waders
flavor: Captain Crimson, scourge of the Twin Seas, claimed his numerous victories were the result of sensible�yet fashionable�footwear.

name: Chantodo's Force
flavor: Only a master of the mystical arts can harness the forces contained within this orb.

name: Chantodo's Will
flavor: When the demons walk this world once again, so shall the power of the archmage Chantodo.

name: The Compass Rose
flavor: The road goes ever on...

name: Crown of the Invoker
flavor: "Evil continued to test my defenses. Soon after entering the swamplands, I was caught in an unnatural fog. As I lost sight of the path, I spotted a being in the distance crowned in thorns. I was not alone." -- Olenna's journal

name: Crown of the Light
flavor: Some Crusaders fought the Darkness. Crusader Anajinn sought the Light.

name: Cuirass of the Wastes
flavor: Narthal of the Bear Tribe discovered the aftermath of a great battle in the wastes. He did not recognize the dead, but noticed that many had filed their teeth to points. Among the debris of the battle, he found this cuirass.

name: Cuisses of Akkhan
flavor: "Let the crusaders wrap their legs in plate of wondrous strength. Their stride will take them to the salvation of the Zakarum faith. Thus shall Akarat's word be cleansed." -Akkhan

name: Danetta's Revenge

custom.name: Vault Gains Rattling Roll
custom.format: Vault gains the effect of the Rattling Roll rune.

flavor: Danetta's vengeance is written in the corpses of the spawn of Hell.

name: Danetta's Spite

custom.name: Leave Clone After Vault
custom.format: Leave a clone of yourself behind after using Vault.

flavor: The creed of the demon hunters was born from the blood of Danetta's people.

name: Dashing Pauldrons of Despair
flavor: �Delsere's madness was a tragic loss. He melted down so many pieces, calling them inelegant. Yet each was more beautiful than most artisans could ever hope to craft.� -High Councilor Valthek

name: Demon's Aileron
flavor: Sulam knew that encountering armor made from the flesh of their fallen brethren would infuriate the demons, and this brought him great joy.

name: Demon's Animus
flavor: Sulam met an unfortunate end when he tried to harvest the flesh of a demon that was not actually dead. He was never able to complete this, the last piece of his set. Fortunately, he left the plans for its construction.

name: Demon's Marrow
flavor: Sulam had a vision of creating a suit of armor, crafted from the flesh of demons, in order to use their power against them.

name: Demon's Plate
flavor: Patterned after the work of Sulam, the armorer who followed in the path of the warrior Myrdgar and collected the skins of fallen demons in order to craft a nearly impenetrable suit of armor.

name: Demon's Restraint
flavor: The original version of this belt was composed of the flesh and teeth of five different demons.

name: Eight-Demon Boots
flavor: "Infused with the powers of wind, lightning, all that kind of thing! Then again... a couple of extra demons never hurt." �Yolk Chen

name: Eyes of the Earth
flavor: Mountains crumble. Cliffs fall. Canyons rip asunder. The forces that shape the land are a mystery to most. But not to you. Not anymore.

name: Fiendish Grips
flavor: "If you cannot learn to direct your hatred, it will consume you." -Kovan the Merciless

name: Fierce Gauntlets
flavor: �When Delsere delivered these gauntlets for critique, he wanted to know how looking at them made me feel. When I did not understand his question, he stormed off.� -High Councilor Valthek

name: Firebird's Breast
flavor: "The origins of the 'Firebird' set remain a mystery. Their magical structures are advanced, yet they appear to be hundreds of years old."�Magus Vaeh Callee

name: Firebird's Down
flavor: "These pantaloons reflect energy along localized leys within its weave. Only the most advanced Art could even conceive such patterns."�Tath of Harakas

name: Firebird's Eye
flavor: "This orb is a super-spun energy gyre. Arcane and thermal energies can be sealed within for long periods, and when the spin is reversed those energies unspool and may be employed." �Magus Arrin Eberhart

name: Firebird's Pinions
flavor: "I have discovered hollows beneath the surface of these shoulder plates. They appear to trap the fleeting arcanum thrown off by traditional casting and draw it back into the mage!" �Quov Tsin

name: Firebird's Plume
flavor: "The stylized crests of this headpiece are cunningly enchanted to channel and dissipate sudden and dangerous discharges of arcanum." �Ennead Sage Resko

name: Firebird's Talons
flavor: "These clawlike gauntlets are cool to the touch, even in the presence of significant heat. This requires further study." �Vaetia of Zann Esu

name: Firebird's Tarsi
flavor: "The metal plates of these greaves hang on swivels, permitting them to swing. The plates exaggerate the soma of a casting wizard. From a design standpoint, truly remarkable feats!" �Landes the Keeth

name: Fists of Thunder
flavor: "When one's strike is true, the force of the blow expands into an electric shockwave that echoes through one's soul." �Matriarch Lian Rasmussen

name: Flail of the Charge
flavor: "Give me a flail and a horse, and I will save the zakarum faith." -Norvald the Crusader

name: Focus
flavor: Grand Mage Chengat, one of the first masters of the Yshari Sanctum, crafted the rings Focus and Restraint to work in conjunction with one another to bolster the user's mental fortitude.

name: Foundation of the Earth
flavor: Even the grandest structure will fall if it is built on sand.

name: Foundation of the Light
flavor: Anajinn�s apprentice became Anajinn in her time, and the search for the Light continued.

name: Gauntlet of the Wastes
flavor: Offo of the Henknoc Tribe discovered a barrow in the wastes. Inside, skeletons with filed teeth were arrayed around the body of a great king. Offo left as quickly as he could, taking only the king�s gauntlets.

name: Gauntlets of Akkhan
flavor: "Let the crusaders cover their hands with gauntlets of unsurpassed strength, for they will someday find the redemption of the Zakarum faith, and on that day, they must reach out and grasp it." -Akkhan

name: Guardian's Aversion
flavor: The enigmatic sorcerer known only as the Guardian was convinced the world would one day turn against magic users, and he prepared himself accordingly.

name: Guardian's Case
flavor: Many believe the symbol emblazoned on the Guardian's scabbard represents a brotherhood he founded to implement his unfathomable plans.

name: Guardian's Gaze
flavor: Fashioned after the helmet of the notorious Guardian, which was made to protect his mind from those that would try to subvert it.

name: Hallowed Barricade
flavor: Based upon a damaged angelic shield recently unearthed and subsequently identified as dating from the very earliest days of the world.

name: Hallowed Baton
flavor: An angelic artifact re-forged to suit the needs of a hero wielding the powers of the nephalem.

name: Hallowed Breach
flavor: This axe derives its awesome and majestic power from the High Heavens.

name: Hallowed Condemnation
flavor: An angelic weapon re-forged to suit the needs of a hero wielding the powers of the nephalem.

name: Hallowed Hold
flavor: An angelic weapon re-forged to suit the needs of a hero wielding the powers of the nephalem.

name: Hallowed Nemesis
flavor: An angelic weapon re-forged to suit the needs of a hero wielding the powers of the nephalem.

name: Hallowed Sufferance
flavor: An angelic weapon re-forged to suit the needs of a hero wielding the powers of the nephalem.

name: Harness of Truth
flavor: �Delsere described this armor as resplendent. When asked why that mattered, he would rant that form is function. Any praise for his advanced magical crafting skills only infuriated him more.� -High Councilor Valthek

name: Heart of the Crashing Wave
flavor: "Tranquility of spirit belies the furious tide raging deep beneath a calm surface." �Ivgorod proverb

name: Heart of the Light
flavor: The Crusader Anajinn knew that the search for the Light would be the greatest test of her life. She embraced it eagerly.

name: Hell Walkers
flavor: �Hell is a state of mind.� -Kovan the Merciless

name: Helltooth Gauntlets
flavor: "The spirits say that great demons can never die. I say they have not yet met me." �Jeram of the Whispering Valley

name: Helltooth Greaves
flavor: "As I slay more and more demons, I have come to know their purpose. They exist to make us stronger." �Jeram of the Whispering Valley

name: Helltooth Leg Guards
flavor: "Those who garb themselves in the bones of demons need never fear them." �Jeram of the Whispering Valley

name: Helltooth Mantle
flavor: "I asked the spirits how to defeat evil, but they were always silent. After seven sunsets, my answer came�evil defeats itself. Only after many more sunsets did I understand." �Jeram of the Whispering Valley

name: Helltooth Mask
flavor: When the khazra slew Jeram's family, he crafted this terrible mask to seek revenge. Those who came across the khazra dead, half-devoured, swollen, and scorched, knew it could only be Jeram's work.

name: Helltooth Tunic
flavor: "Great power festers within demon skulls. Wear them close to your heart, and feel their dark magic thunder through you." �Jeram of the Whispering Valley

name: Helm of Akkhan
flavor: "Let the crusaders encase their skulls in a helm of surpassing strength, for a crusader's most potent weapon is the mind. And thus shall the crusader be a champion of Akarat's will." -Akkhan

name: Helm of the Wastes
flavor: Noglar of the Crane Tribe went into the wastes for his rite of adulthood. He returned with tales of horrendous cannibal barbarian tribes, many new scars, and this helm.

name: Immortal King's Boulder Breaker
flavor: The favorite weapon of Worusk, the king of the tribes.

name: Immortal King's Eternal Reign
flavor: Worn during the Immortal King's final battle.

name: Immortal King's Irons
flavor: Worusk struck his enemies so hard his hands would have broken had they not been protected.

name: Immortal King's Stature
flavor: Crafted to commemorate Worusk�s ascendance to the position of Immortal King, the first and only time this honor was bestowed since Bul-Kathos ruled the tribes.

name: Immortal King's Stride
flavor: The king of the barbarians strode the world like a god.

name: Immortal King's Tribal Binding
flavor: The mark of the king adorns this belt.

name: Immortal King's Triumph
flavor: In the days when the barbarians roamed the entire western continent�long before the coming of Rakkis�one man, Worusk, united the tribes, and for the briefest of moments, the barbarians had a king.

name: Inarius's Conviction
flavor: Few angels have ever willingly abandoned the High Heavens. From the moment Inarius created Sanctuary, he knew that he would never be welcome again in the land of his birth.

name: Inarius's Martyrdom
flavor: Inarius was sent to be tortured eternally in the Hells for creating the world of Sanctuary. In this punishment, he has been denied even the freedom of death.

name: Inarius's Perseverance
flavor: When the power of the nephalem became a threat, Inarius sought to have them weakened at any cost.

name: Inarius's Reticence
flavor: Inarius became watchful as the first nephalem grew up. His own son, Linarian, later known as Rathma, is said to have inherited his father's stoicism.

name: Inarius's Understanding
flavor: Inarius was the first of the angels to truly look into the heart of a demon.

name: Inarius's Will
flavor: Inarius would stop at nothing to end the war between angels and demons.

name: Inna's Favor
flavor: Gird yourself with the wisdom of Inna that you may gain her favor.

name: Inna's Hold
flavor: When Inna became displeased with a star, she would don these gloves, and hurl the offending star through the night sky.

name: Inna's Radiance
flavor: Inna, the goddess of the sky, radiates beauty for all to see.

name: Inna's Reach
flavor: Inlaid with prayers to Inna's righteous judgment.

name: Inna's Sandals
flavor: Inna, the goddess of the sky, treads upon clouds in the winter and the summer, in the night and the day.

name: Inna's Temperance
flavor: The goddess of the sky is infinite in her glory.

name: Inna's Vast Expanse
flavor: Only the holy will find refuge in Inna's arms.

name: Jade Harvester's Courage
flavor: Tukam's first child was born while he was fighting in the Harvest of Souls. He claimed a spirit whispered the news to him, and that the knowledge gave him the courage to overcome his many foes.

name: Jade Harvester's Joy
flavor: Tukam lost many friends in his first Harvest of Souls, a ritual war fought by the umbaru. Yet, he did not weep for the dead. He celebrated their passing, knowing their spirits ran free in the Unformed Land.

name: Jade Harvester's Mercy
flavor: Tukam prized mercy above all else in battle, for he knew that the tribes he fought were not true enemies. When he eventually met their spirits in the Unformed Land, they would embrace each other as family.

name: Jade Harvester's Peace
flavor: Tukam had outlived both his children and grandchildren by the time he finally fell in battle. As his rivals prepared him for ritual sacrifice, he wept tears of joy at the thought of meeting his loved ones again.

name: Jade Harvester's Swiftness
flavor: Tukam moved through the jungles with such grace and speed that some witch doctors claimed he was not umbaru at all, but a spirit sent to their world from Mbwiru Eikura.

name: Jade Harvester's Wisdom
flavor: Every umbaru knows of Tukam, the Jade Harvester. The witch doctor became famous for adorning himself in armor he carved from green jade, which he believed heightened his connection with the spirits.

name: Jesseth Skullscythe
flavor: This assembly of sharpened bones will make you a true artist in combat.

name: Jesseth Skullshield
flavor: "Your defenses must therefore be as flexible and inventive as the enemies you face." -Necromancer Jesseth

name: Krelm's Buff Belt

custom.name: Move Speed When Not Taking Damage
custom.format: Gain 25%% run speed. This effect is lost for 5 seconds after taking damage.

flavor: �Whereupon having vanquished the Oglak beast that had devoured a ten-stone weight worth of villagers, didst they hitherto beseech Krelm the Immodest to remain henceforth as the village champion and erected a statue to honor his name hereinafter.� -Excerpt from Stories Meant to Frighten Small Children

name: Krelm's Buff Bracers

custom.name: Stun Immunity
custom.format: You are immune to Knockback and Stun effects.

flavor: �Twas hitherto eons past from whence Krelm the Immodest didst thitherward dash forth upon the Blazing Wastes clad only in his bogodile skin belt and bracers to face the loathsome Oglak beast and slew him thence mightily with nigh but his bare hands thereupon.� -Excerpt from Stories Meant to Frighten Small Children

name: Leg Guards of Mystery
flavor: �Delsere repeatedly crafted these leg guards, with only a minimal increase to their magical properties. When I pointed this out, he called me a visionless cretin.� -High Councilor Valthek

name: Litany of the Undaunted
flavor: The names of those who have given their lives to fight the scourge of the Burning Hells are inscribed on this band, each one giving its power to the wearer.

name: Little Rogue
flavor: "Istvan would face his enemies with the Slanderer in one hand and Little Rogue in the other. He was so swift that his opponents seldom saw the swords move before they fell." �Deckard Cain

name: Manajuma's Carving Knife
flavor: Clan chief Manajuma's sacrificial knife.

name: Manajuma's Gory Fetch
flavor: Manajuma imbued this dead chicken with much magic�for reasons only he can know.

name: Mantle of the Upside-Down Sinners
flavor: Elemental energy engulfs the monk bold enough to don this mantle, eager to be unleashed against the monk's enemies.

name: Marauder's Carapace
flavor: "We can wear the demons� armaments, their very flesh, upon our bodies, and become something more than human�a nightmare reflection of demonkind�to sow chaos and death among them."�Hunter Esche Maithe

name: Marauder's Encasement
flavor: "I envelop myself in the trappings of my foes, and I learn their ways. I can bathe in the foul darkness of their kind and emerge clean, for I am purified by my vengeance."�Hunter Kee Morse

name: Marauder's Gloves
flavor: "One day, your quivers will run empty, your traps will fail, and the enemy will surge forward. You will be left with nothing but the grip you keep on your blade. Never forget this."�Hunter Cie Wyrtam

name: Marauder's Spines
flavor: "One of the hunter's greatest tools is fear. Whenever possible, we terrify our foes, break their ranks, and pick them off."�Hunter John Yang

name: Marauder's Treads
flavor: "You will learn to walk as we do. You will stalk these monsters, and after you have made your kill and faded away, the demons will find naught but their own treads upon the earth."�Hunter Aoron Gunes

name: Marauder's Visage
flavor: "We channel our anger, the fury of the demons, the rage of the beasts, into power. We become the face of destruction."�Hunter Val Amark

name: Mask of the Searing Sky
flavor: It is said that the hollow eyes of this mask�s fearsome visage will show an enemy her fate. However, few live long enough to make use of that revelation.

name: Mountain of the Light
flavor: The Crusader Anajinn believed that the Light could be found in everyone. But it was dimmed, and in need of succor from some external source.

name: Natalya's Bloody Footprints
flavor: Treading through the blood of demons brought her some small semblance of peace.

name: Natalya's Embrace
flavor: Natalya knew how to use the darkness as a weapon.

name: Natalya's Leggings
flavor: Anywhere her prey could run, Natalya could follow.

name: Natalya's Reflection
flavor: A symbol of the old ways.

name: Natalya's Sight
flavor: She had new prey, and they would not escape her sight.

name: Natalya's Slayer
flavor: Natalya turned from the ways of the Viz-Jaq'taar and sought redemption in the weapons of the demon hunters.

name: Natalya's Touch
flavor: She used these gloves while learning the finer points of murderous archery.

name: Pauldrons of Akkhan
flavor: "Let the crusaders armor their flanks in plate of incredible strength, for their path is dangerous, and death will come at them from all sides." -Akkhan

name: Pauldrons of the Wastes
flavor: Forckan of the Shadow Wolf Tribe was captured by cannibals in the wastes. He escaped before dinnertime and stole just enough equipment to survive, including these pauldrons.

name: Pestilence Battle Boots
flavor: "Be ready to cross long distances and difficult terrain. The Balance is seldom disturbed in a series of convenient locations." �Deathspeaker Mykan

name: Pestilence Defense
flavor: "If all else fails, the pointed tips of your pauldrons can gouge into an enemy's flesh, distracting them while you cast your final spell. You didn't think they were merely for show, did you?" �Deathspeaker Mykan

name: Pestilence Gloves
flavor: "You may use death magic, but you are not invulnerable. Wear good armor, and maintain it well." �Deathspeaker Mykan

name: Pestilence Incantations
flavor: "Keep your spells close, lest your enemies get closer." �Deathspeaker Mykan

name: Pestilence Mask
flavor: "When wielding the powers of blight, it is wise to protect your face." �Deathspeaker Mykan

name: Pestilence Robe
flavor: Deathspeaker Mykan was a gifted leader of the Priests of Rathma who wrote many of their strongest spells in the early years of the order. He was well known for his sharp wits and even sharper tongue.

name: Pride of the Invoker
flavor: "My opponent�s hands were fast. She quickly cast aside my shield and plunged her dagger toward my heart. As my armor broke her blade, her surprised look was just the opening I needed." -- Olenna's journal

name: Pull of the Earth
flavor: No mortal can escape the grasp of the earth. No matter how high something jumps or flies, it inevitably plummets back to the ground. Imagine that power in your hands.

name: Raekor's Breeches
flavor: Originally part of Joritz the Mighty's fearsome armor, Raekor wore these oxen-hide breeches into battle for the rest of her life following her husband's untimely death.

name: Raekor's Budren
flavor: These spaulders are the symbol of the Oxen Tribe Warmaster. Raekor stripped them from her fallen commander and donned them herself in order to lead her tribe to victory at the sack of Samauren.

name: Raekor's Heart
flavor: Joritz the Mighty dedicated his life to Raekor after she liberated him from a Samaurenian labor camp. This magnificent brigandine was his gift to her on their wedding day.

name: Raekor's Striders
flavor: Loren of the Samaurenian famously said he would crush the barbarians beneath his boots. Raekor took great delight in ripping them from his cold, dead feet. Forever after, they were a symbol of Raekor's greatest triumph.

name: Raekor's Will
flavor: Though barbarian women were respected as warriors, they were still seen as inferior to their male brethren on the field of battle�until the coming of Raekor, the first woman to attain the exalted status of warmaster.

name: Raekor's Wraps
flavor: These ox-leather gloves were crafted specifically to commemorate Raekor's ascension to the status of warmaster.

name: Rathma's Macabre Vambraces
flavor: Master Necromancers are honored with a few bones from the skeleton minions that once served Rathma. These artifacts are generally used in the priest's gloves.

name: Rathma's Ossified Sabatons
flavor: Each fragment of this armor came from a corpse that died at a different age. Fully assembled, they represent a thousand years of death.

name: Rathma's Ribcage Plate
flavor: Mendeln declared that all priests would display bones in their armor as symbols of their mastery over death.

name: Rathma's Skeletal Legplates
flavor: The bones of many creatures have been artfully arranged in this protective armor that is based on Rathma's own design.

name: Rathma's Skull Helm
flavor: No known being, living or dead, possesses a skull like this one. Its origins lie in mystery, like the fate of Rathma himself.

name: Rathma's Spikes
flavor: The twin skulls represent the forces of light and darkness, each balanced on the shoulders of a Priest of Rathma.

name: Renewal of the Invoker
flavor: "The mists began to clear as the healing rituals mended the lost acolyte's mind and body. She wished her armor destroyed but it was all she had to survive the wilds. If it could also be purified, it would still be of use." -- Olenna's journal

name: Restraint
flavor: Restraint was crafted to be an integral part of the set of magical rings known as the Bastion of Will. Each ring bears a raised symbol that denotes its signature power to those with the wisdom to interpret them.

name: Roland's Bearing
flavor: "My master believed salvation knows no bounds. I was a soul to be saved, so he saved me. That is why I proudly bear his name. The name of a great man." �Meditations on My Redemption

name: Roland's Determination
flavor: "My master would not be deterred. My redemption, even in the face of my obstinate nature, testifies to the depth of his faith in his beliefs, and in me." �Meditations on My Redemption

name: Roland's Grasp
flavor: "I slew many an opponent with my bare hands before my master rescued me from the fighting pits of Kalden. His gauntlets now sanctify these instruments of death." �Meditations on My Redemption

name: Roland's Mantle
flavor: "Many an hour I spent polishing these pauldrons, cursing the name of Roland. Would that I could polish them for him again, and place them on his shoulders one last time." �Meditations on My Redemption

name: Roland's Stride
flavor: "I walk forever in my master�s boots so that I never forget how my insolence caused his death. To honor his memory, I live my life in a manner that embodies everything it means to be a crusader." �Meditations on My Redemption

name: Roland's Visage
flavor: "Time passes, but the memory of my master, and the knowledge of what he did for me, does not fade. In fact, it grows stronger. I swear his name shall never be forgotten." �Meditations on My Redemption

name: Sabaton of the Wastes
flavor: The Tribe of Thunder was moving through the wastes when a madman with one arm rushed from the snowy twilight, babbling of horrendous acts, both suffered and witnessed. He was clad only in rags and these sabatons.

name: Sabatons of Akkhan
flavor: "Let the crusaders sheathe their feet in sabatons of unquestionable strength, for the crusade will take them all over the world." -Akkhan

name: Sage's Apogee
flavor: Patterned after Imris's unique circle of protection, which was powered by his own magic to not only ward off attackers but also strengthen his mind.

name: Sage's Passage
flavor: The ancient sage Imris crafted the original version of these boots to protect him while he traveled the world, seeking a way to retune the Worldstone to restore the power of the nephalem.

name: Sage's Purchase
flavor: Imris designed these gloves to help him channel the awesome forces at his command.

name: Scales of the Dancing Serpent
flavor: "The dancing form slipped lithely through the rustling forest, hypnotic and beautiful. I did not understand my fate until I felt the sting, looked down, and saw the blood pour from my chest..." �Journey to the South

name: Shackles of the Invoker
flavor: "I discovered my enemy was just a young Vizjerei apprentice, no older than twelve. Defeated, her armor began to turn against her. Cursed thorns dug deep into her arms and drew blood. I had to act quickly." -- Olenna's journal

name: The Shadow's Bane
flavor: Legends in the Dreadlands speak of an uncanny demon hunter named Kunai who could become one with shadow.

name: The Shadow's Burden
flavor: �This power is not to be taken lightly. Those lacking in will may find they�ve lost their way should they dwell in the shadows too long.� -Demon Hunter Kunai

name: The Shadow's Coil
flavor: "Step into the abyss. Welcome it. Know it. It's yours, now." �Demon Hunter Kunai

name: The Shadow's Grasp
flavor: "Fear nothing you can touch. What you can touch, you can destroy." �Demon Hunter Kunai

name: The Shadow's Heels
flavor: "I walk amongst the shadows and call them my own. With every silent stride, I claim my domain." �Demon Hunter Kunai

name: The Shadow's Mask
flavor: �The darkness is your friend and your enemy�s nightmare.� -Demon Hunter Kunai

name: Shenlong's Fist of Legend
flavor: Many claim Shenlong is but a myth. Those who have felt the unrelenting fury of his wrath would argue otherwise.

name: Shenlong's Relentless Assault
flavor: "Your blows must flow from one to the next in an endless succession to overwhelm a superior foe." �Master Shenlong

name: Shield of the Steed
flavor: "My master used to claim a flail and a horse are all that is needed to see the crusade to its conclusion. I'd bring along a shield as well, just to be safe." -Norvald the Crusader

name: Shrouded Mask
flavor: �Delsere proclaimed this Mask the jewel of his magnum opus, only to break down and weep that he must start over. Shortly after, his magnum opus disappeared, as did Delsere.� -High Councilor Valthek

name: The Slanderer
flavor: "Istvan was a daring swordsman known for taunting his enemies with this wicked, gleaming longsword." �Deckard Cain.

name: Spires of the Earth
flavor: Travelers speak of a stone arch in the desert, where mystics seek wisdom from supernatural visions, or strength from the ground. Some claim to have received both.

name: Spirit of the Earth
flavor: The spirit of the earth is the strongest force there is, nothing can withstand its power.

name: Striders of Destiny
flavor: �Like many of his fellow students, Delsere was fascinated by Li-Ming. His master work was an homage to her, and he swore one day she would wear it.� -High Councilor Valthek

name: Sunwuko's Balance
flavor: The pauldrons of Sunwuko the Monkey King are renowned for their ability to improve agility. With these equipped, a trained monk can master the martial arts... or dance.

name: Sunwuko's Crown
flavor: Trained by the famed monks of Ivgorod, Sunwuko returned to his homeland of Xiansai, where his frenzied fighting earned him the title "Monkey King." Intended as a joke, the name soon became feared.

name: Sunwuko's Leggings
flavor: One of the many legends told of Sunwuko maintains that he scaled Shengmu Feng, the tallest mountain in the Guozhi mountain range, planted a flag, and declared himself 'The Great Sage Equal to Heaven'.

name: Sunwuko's Paws
flavor: Sunwuko is said to have been the greatest staff fighter from Xiansai to Ivgorod, and his gloves possess a nimbleness to them second to none.

name: Sunwuko's Shines
flavor: Sunwuko possessed such control over his physical form, it's said he could make a copy of himself from a single hair. But no matter how many copies he made, this talisman would always be worn by the true Monkey King.

name: Sunwuko's Soul
flavor: Though he was said to be 'awakened to emptiness', Sunwuko could never relinquish his violent ways. In truth, he reveled in them.

name: Tal Rasha's Allegiance
flavor: Tal Rasha valiantly led the Horadrim under the guidance of Tyrael, the archangel of Justice. Their oath is carved onto the surface of this amulet.

name: Tal Rasha's Brace
flavor: Every aspect of the Horadrim�s dress was carefully chosen to augment his magical abilities.

name: Tal Rasha's Grasp
flavor: Tal Rasha inducted recruits into the Horadrim with these gloves.

name: Tal Rasha's Guise of Wisdom
flavor: The symbol of the Horadric order.

name: Tal Rasha's Relentless Pursuit
flavor: The Horadrim dedicated themselves to tracking down and imprisoning the Prime Evils to protect all of mankind from Hell's dark corruption.

name: Tal Rasha's Stride
flavor: All Horadrim were careful to clothe themselves in garments of subtlety and power. None more so than Tal Rasha.

name: Tal Rasha's Unwavering Glare
flavor: Tal Rasha stored much of his power in this source before sacrificing himself to imprison the demon lord Baal.

name: Talisman of Akkhan
flavor: "Let the crusader's neck be graced with a protective amulet that will shield its wearer from harm, just as faith shields the souls of the devout from all peril." -Akkhan

name: Tasset of the Wastes
flavor: Jorkt of the Snake Tribe found a mad hermit smith in the wastes, who forged this tasset for him, but took Jorkt�s fingers and toes in payment.

name: Towers of the Light
flavor: Anajinn took an apprentice who would seek the Light as she had, and her master before her.

name: Trag'Oul's Claws
flavor: Most live and die without ever knowing why. The wisdom of Trag'Oul opens the way for those who wish to comprehend their greater purpose.

name: Trag'Oul's Guise
flavor: Trag'Oul, guardian of Sanctuary, was the teacher of Rathma, and the first to understand the Balance. Those who follow the One Who Is Forever will always stand sentinel over this world.

name: Trag'Oul's Heart
flavor: Life and death flow through the Cycle as blood flows through veins.

name: Trag'Oul's Hide
flavor: Though his fate is tied to that of Sanctuary, none have seen the guardian Trag'Oul for years beyond count. The implications are dire, but the Priests of Rathma have not lost faith.

name: Trag'Oul's Scales
flavor: Trag'Oul believed that war on Sanctuary could devour all of existence if left unchecked.

name: Trag'Oul's Stalwart Greaves
flavor: The protectors of the Balance must stand on the edge of two worlds, accepted by neither, masters of both.

name: The Traveler's Pledge
flavor: Adventure's call cannot be denied.

name: Uliana's Burden
flavor: �Uliana�s beliefs were forever altered when she was attacked on the road by beings she believed to be agents of the gods of chaos-if not the gods themselves. She had never imagined beings of such horror could actually exist.� -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

name: Uliana's Destiny
flavor: �Uliana�s passion to defeat the gods of chaos drew the ire of the Patriarchs, for a monk was to seek balance in all things. She disappeared shortly after her excommunication, never to be seen again, swearing to eradicate all agents of chaos for the good of all mankind.� -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

name: Uliana's Fury
flavor: �After her encounter with the demonic creatures in the Aranoch, Uliana became obsessed with defeating the gods of chaos, and, to this end, began adapting the forms of the Veradani towards the martial style every monk is familiar with today.� -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

name: Uliana's Heart
flavor: �Ultimately, she was unable to view her exile as punishment, as she firmly believed the monks� true calling was to inspire the masses, not lock themselves away.� -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

name: Uliana's Spirit
flavor: �Uliana was the first to venture out amongst the laymen while retaining her status-for in those days, monks were forbidden to leave the monasteries, with their forms being used solely to commune with the gods.� -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

name: Uliana's Strength
flavor: �Uliana questioned the orthodoxy that the gods were actual beings, asking if they might not instead be metaphors to guide the monk�s spiritual development. For her temerity, she was ordered to wander the world and seek repentance.�-Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani

name: Unholy Plates
flavor: �Josen often said that everything is a test, including life itself. How will you fare when your mettle is tested?� -Kovan the Merciless

name: Unsanctified Shoulders
flavor: �A demon hunter who fully tempers their hatred with discipline will see their vengeance clearly.� -Kovan the Merciless

name: Vyr's Astonishing Aura
flavor: "Vyr created his famed obelisk to gather the power of the Archon, a being he claimed existed on a different plane of reality. He is even reputed to have stored this macabre power in armor of his own design." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Vyr's Fantastic Finery
flavor: "Vyr was a tyrant, but took enormous pride in his appearance. It is believed he was wearing these silken trousers the day he was murdered by his own acolytes." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Vyr's Grasping Gauntlets
flavor: "It's posited that Vyr created these enchanted gloves to protect his hands while he manipulated power summoned from beyond this realm." �Abd al-Hazir

name: Vyr's Proud Pauldrons
flavor: �Vyr was convinced not only of his intellectual superiority and martial prowess, but also in his complete control over his acolytes. He was sadly mistaken on all counts.� -Abd al-Hazir

name: Vyr's Sightless Skull
flavor: �Vyr's paranoia finally became all-encompassing. As his days approached their violent end, he demanded a defense be crafted against the constant psychic assaults being waged upon him by his enemies.� -Abd al-Hazir

name: Vyr's Swaggering Stance
flavor: "The last piece of Vyr's Archon armor to be found, these ornate boots were long believed to have been destroyed along with the Black Obelisk that bore the wizard�s name." �Abd al-Hazir

name: The Wailing Host
flavor: The primal force of a thousand screaming souls calls forth from this ring.

name: Weight of the Earth
flavor: All living creatures trust in the stillness of the earth. They know nothing of the currents that flow beneath its surface. They do not comprehend its weight. They cannot understand its power.

name: Will of the Light
flavor: Anajinn knew the Darkness would take her before the Light was found. But it did not matter, it had always been the search that mattered.

name: Zeal of the Invoker
flavor: "Her thorned armor having been purified in the Light, my apprentice's new faith grew with each step. The feet that wandered lost in the mist now march with fervor as we leave these swamplands at long last and head north." -- Olenna's journal

name: Zunimassa's Cloth
flavor: Zunimassa believed that power was born of movement, and movement born of legs.

name: Zunimassa's Finger Wraps
flavor: All witch doctors know that the best way to hear the whispers of Zunimassa is to perform the rituals flawlessly, with fingers nimble and strong.

name: Zunimassa's Marrow
flavor: The warrior who dons this armor will always have the spirit of Zunimassa upon them.

name: Zunimassa's Pox
flavor: Contains the power of the plague that took Zunimassa to the Unformed Land.

name: Zunimassa's String of Skulls
flavor: When threatened, she drew upon the spirits to unleash the fury buried within.

name: Zunimassa's Trail
flavor: Zunimassa spread her wisdom further than any other witch doctor of the Teganze.

name: Zunimassa's Vision
flavor: The elder spirit Zunimassa communes with the wearer of this mask to reveal the ways in which the world emerges from the Unformed Land.
